cards.name: Angel of Serenity
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.
When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

rulings.text: If Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield before its enters-the-battlefield ability has resolved, its leaves-the-battlefield ability will trigger and do nothing. Then the enters-the-battlefield ability will resolve and exile the targeted creatures and/or creature cards indefinitely.

If a creature targeted by the enters-the-battlefield ability dies before that ability resolves, it will become an illegal target even though it may be a creature card in a graveyard when the ability resolves. It won’t be exiled.
You choose the targets as part of putting the enters-the-battlefield trigger on the stack. Because that ability includes “you may,” you choose whether to exile the targets when the ability resolves.
You choose up to three total targets from among other creatures on the battlefield and creature cards in graveyards. You may choose zero targets.

foreignNames.name: Engel der Reinheit
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Engel der Reinheit ins Spiel kommt, kannst du bis zu drei andere Kreaturen deiner Wahl aus dem Spiel und/oder Kreaturenkarten deiner Wahl aus Friedhöfen ins Exil schicken.
Wenn der Engel der Reinheit das Spiel verlässt, bringe die ins Exil geschickten Karten auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.

foreignNames.name: Ángel de serenidad
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Ángel de serenidad entre al campo de batalla, puedes exiliar hasta tres otras criaturas del campo de batalla y/o cartas de criatura objetivo de cementerios.
Cuando el Ángel de serenidad deje el campo de batalla, regresa las cartas exiliadas a las manos de sus propietarios.

foreignNames.name: Ange de la sérénité
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand l'Ange de la sérénité arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez exiler jusqu'à trois autres créatures ciblées du champ de bataille et/ou cartes de créature des cimetières.
Quand l'Ange de la sérénité quitte le champ de bataille, renvoyez les cartes exilées dans les mains de leurs propriétaires.

foreignNames.name: Angelo della Serenità
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando l'Angelo della Serenità entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi esiliare fino a tre altre creature bersaglio dal campo di battaglia e/o carte creatura dai cimiteri.
Quando l'Angelo della Serenità lascia il campo di battaglia, fai tornare le carte esiliate in mano ai rispettivi proprietari.

foreignNames.name: 静穏の天使
foreignNames.text:
飛行
静穏の天使が戦場に出たとき、あなたは戦場にある他のクリーチャーかいずれかの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード、あるいはその両方から最大３つまでを対象とし、それらを追放してもよい。
静穏の天使が戦場を離れたとき、その追放されたカードをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 天使

foreignNames.name: 평온의 천사
foreignNames.text:
비행
평온의 천사가 전장에 들어올 때, 전장에 있는 다른 생물과 무덤에 있는 생물 카드 중에서 목표를 최대 세 개까지 정한다. 당신은 그 목표들을 추방할 수 있다.
평온의 천사가 전장을 떠날 때, 추방된 카드들을 각각 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Anjo da Serenidade
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando Anjo da Serenidade entra no campo de batalha, você pode exilar até três outras criaturas alvo do campo de batalha e/ou cards de criatura de cemitérios.
Quando Anjo da Serenidade deixar o campo de batalha, devolva os cards exilados para as mãos de seus donos.

foreignNames.name: Ангел Безмятежности
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Когда Ангел Безмятежности выходит на поле битвы, вы можете изгнать до трех других целевых существ с поля битвы и (или) карт существ из кладбищ.
Когда Ангел Безмятежности покидает поле битвы, верните изгнанные карты в руки их владельцев.

foreignNames.name: 清朗天使
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当清朗天使进战场时，你可以从战场放逐其他的目标生物和／或从任意坟墓场放逐生物牌，上述数量至多为三。
当清朗天使离开战场时，将所放逐的牌各移回其拥有者手上。

foreignNames.name: 清朗天使
foreignNames.text:
飛行
當清朗天使進戰場時，你可以從戰場放逐其他的目標生物和／或從任意墳墓場放逐生物牌，上述數量至多為三。
當清朗天使離開戰場時，將所放逐的牌各移回其擁有者手上。

cards.originalText:
Flying
When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.
When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Armory Guard
cards.text: Armory Guard has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.
cards.flavor: The Dimir agents watched from the shadows. "Eight hours, and I've yet to see him blink," Nefara hissed. "I suggest we find another way in."

rulings.text: Vigilance only matters when Armory Guard is being declared as an attacking creature. If Armory Guard is already attacking, losing control of your only Gate won’t cause Armory Guard to become tapped or to leave combat.

foreignNames.name: Wächter des Arsenals
foreignNames.text: Der Wächter des Arsenals hat Wachsamkeit, solange du ein Tor kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Dimir-Agenten sahen aus den Schatten heraus zu. „Acht Stunden, und ich habe ihn noch nicht blinzeln gesehen", zischte Nefara. „Ich schlage vor, wir suchen uns einen anderen Weg hinein."

foreignNames.name: Guardia de la armería
foreignNames.text: El Guardia de la armería tiene la habilidad de vigilancia mientras controles un Portal.
foreignNames.flavor: Los agentes dimir observaban desde las sombras. "En ocho horas no ha parpadeado una sola vez", susurró Nefara. "Sugiero que busquemos otra forma de entrar."

foreignNames.name: Garde de l'armurerie
foreignNames.text: Le Garde de l'armurerie a la vigilance tant que vous contrôlez une porte.
foreignNames.flavor: Les agents dimirs observaient depuis les ombres. « En huit heures, je ne l'ai pas vu broncher une seule fois », siffla Nefara. « Je suggère que nous trouvions un autre moyen d'entrer. »

foreignNames.name: Guardia dell'Armeria
foreignNames.text: La Guardia dell'Armeria ha cautela fintanto che controlli un Cancello.
foreignNames.flavor: Nascosti nelle ombre, gli agenti Dimir osservavano. "Otto ore e non ha mosso una palpebra," sibilò Nefara. "Dovremo trovare un'altra via per entrare."

foreignNames.name: 武器庫の護衛
foreignNames.text: 武器庫の護衛は、あなたが門をコントロールしているかぎり警戒を持つ。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 巨人・兵士
foreignNames.flavor: ディミーアの工作員は物陰から様子を窺っていた。「８時間も経つのに、まばたきすらしない」とネファーラが囁いた。「別の入り口を探したほうがよさそうね。」

foreignNames.name: 무기고 경비
foreignNames.text: 당신이 관문을 조종하는 한, 무기고 경비는 경계 능력을 가진다.
foreignNames.flavor: 디미르 길드의 하수인들이 그림자 속에서 상황을 지켜봤다. 네파라가 "여덟 시간 동안 녀석은 눈도 한 번 깜빡하지 않았다. 다른 방법을 찾아봐야겠어."라고 내뱉었다.

foreignNames.name: Guarda do Arsenal
foreignNames.text: Guarda do Arsenal terá vigilância enquanto você controlar um terreno do tipo Portão.
foreignNames.flavor: Os agentes Dimir observavam das sombras. "Oito horas e eu ainda não o vi piscar", sussurrou Nefara. Sugiro encontrarmos outra forma de entrar."

foreignNames.name: Страж Оружейного Склада
foreignNames.text: Страж Оружейного Склада имеет Бдительность, пока вы контролируете Врата.
foreignNames.flavor: Агенты Димиров следят из темноты. «За восемь часов я ни разу не видела, чтобы он моргнул», — прошипела Нефара. «Я предлагаю искать другой вход».

foreignNames.name: 军械库守卫
foreignNames.text: 只要你操控门，军械库守卫便具有警戒异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 底密尔密探在阴影中监视着。「八小时了，我还没看到他眨眼。」涅法拉低声咒骂。「我们还是另寻入口吧。」

foreignNames.name: 軍械庫守衛
foreignNames.text: 只要你操控門，軍械庫守衛便具有警戒異能。
foreignNames.flavor: 底密爾密探在陰影中監視著。「八小時了，我還沒看到他眨眼。」涅法拉低聲咒罵。「我們還是另尋入口吧。」

cards.originalText: Armory Guard has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.

cards.name: Arrest
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
cards.flavor:
"We will prove your guilt. We don't arrest the innocent, you know."
—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

rulings.text: Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.

foreignNames.name: Festnahme
foreignNames.text:
Kreaturenverzauberung
Die verzauberte Kreatur kann nicht angreifen oder blocken, und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wir werden deine Schuld beweisen. Wir verhaften nämlich keine Unschuldigen." —Eintreiberin Lavinia, Zehntes Revier

foreignNames.name: Arresto
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura.
La criatura encantada no puede atacar ni bloquear y no pueden activarse sus habilidades activadas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Demostraremos tu culpabilidad. Nunca arrestamos a inocentes." —Encarceladora Lavinia, distrito décimo

foreignNames.name: Arrestation
foreignNames.text:
Enchanter : créature
La créature enchantée ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées.
foreignNames.flavor: « Nous prouverons votre culpabilité. Nous n'arrêtons pas les innocents, vous savez. » —Courtière Lavinia, Dixième circonscription

foreignNames.name: Arrestare
foreignNames.text:
Incanta creatura
La creatura incantata non può attaccare o bloccare e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate.
foreignNames.flavor: "Noi non arrestiamo gli innocenti. Per questo dimostreremo la tua colpevolezza." —Lavinia, polizia del Decimo Distretto

foreignNames.name: 拘引
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
エンチャントされているクリーチャーでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。
foreignNames.type: エンチャント — オーラ
foreignNames.flavor: 「あんたの罪なら立証してやるわ。うちらが無実の者を拘引するわけないでしょ。」 ――第10管区の拘引者、ラヴィニア

foreignNames.name: 체포
foreignNames.text:
생물에게 부여
부여된 생물은 공격하거나 방어할 수 없으며, 그 생물의 활성화능력은 활성화될 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor: "우리가 네 죄를 증명할 것이다. 우린 무고한 자는 체포하지 않는다고." —10번 관할지역 체포원 라비니아

foreignNames.name: Prender
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura
A criatura encantada não pode atacar nem bloquear e as habilidades ativadas dela não podem ser ativadas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Provaremos a sua culpa. Não prendemos inocentes, você sabe." — Encarceradora Lavinia, Décima Jurisdição

foreignNames.name: Арест
foreignNames.text:
Зачаровать существо
Зачарованное существо не может атаковать или блокировать, и его активируемые способности нельзя активировать.
foreignNames.flavor: «Мы докажем вашу вину. Вы же знаете, что мы не арестовываем невиновных». — Задержатель Лавиния, Десятый Округ

foreignNames.name: 逮捕
foreignNames.text:
结附于生物
所结附的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我们将证明你有罪。你要知道，我们不逮捕无罪的人。」 ～第十城郊逮捕人拉温妮

foreignNames.name: 逮捕
foreignNames.text:
結附於生物
所結附的生物不能進行攻擊或阻擋，其起動式異能也不能起動。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我們將證明你有罪。你要知道，我們不逮捕無罪的人。」 ～第十城郊逮捕人拉溫妮

cards.originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

cards.name: Avenging Arrow
cards.text: Destroy target creature that dealt damage this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Forgive the theft. Punish the deception."
—Alcarus, Selesnya archer

rulings.text: Avenging Arrow doesn’t affect the damage the creature dealt. It isn’t retroactively prevented.

It doesn’t matter what the creature dealt damage to. If the creature dealt damage to another creature or a planeswalker, it doesn’t matter whether that creature or planeswalker is still on the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Rächender Pfeil
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die in diesem Zug Schaden zugefügt hat.
foreignNames.flavor: „Der Diebstahl sei vergeben. Der Betrug wird bestraft." —Alcarus, Selesnija-Bogenschütze

foreignNames.name: Flecha vengadora
foreignNames.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo que haya hecho daño este turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Perdona el robo. Castiga el engaño." —Alcarus, arquero selesnya

foreignNames.name: Flèche vengeresse
foreignNames.text: Détruisez la créature ciblée qui a infligé des blessures ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor: « Pardonner le larcin. Punir la tromperie. » —Alcarus, archer de Selesnya

foreignNames.name: Freccia Vendicatrice
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio che ha inflitto danno in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Perdona il furto. Punisci l'inganno." —Alcarus, arciere di Selesnya

foreignNames.name: 報復の矢
foreignNames.text: このターンにダメージを与えたクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 「盗みは許せ。騙しは罰せ。」 ――セレズニアの射手、アルカウス

foreignNames.name: 복수의 화살
foreignNames.text: 이번 턴에 피해를 입힌 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "절도는 용서하되, 속임수는 징벌하라." —셀레스냐 궁수 알카루스

foreignNames.name: Flecha da Vingança
foreignNames.text: Destrua a criatura alvo que tenha causado dano neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Perdoe o roubo. Puna o logro." — Alcarus, arqueiro Selesnya

foreignNames.name: Карающая Стрела
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевое существо, которое нанесло повреждения в этом ходу.
foreignNames.flavor: «Прости за кражу. Накажи за обман». — Алкарус, селезнийский лучник

foreignNames.name: 复仇箭
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标于本回合造成过伤害的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「偷窃可以原谅。欺瞒绝不宽恕。」 ～瑟雷尼亚弓箭手艾凯勒

foreignNames.name: 復仇箭
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標於本回合造成過傷害的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「偷竊可以原諒。欺瞞絕不寬恕。」 ～瑟雷尼亞弓箭手艾凱勒

cards.originalText: Destroy target creature that dealt damage this turn.

cards.name: Azorius Arrester
cards.text: When Azorius Arrester enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
cards.flavor: "You have the right to remain silent. Mostly because I tire of your excuses."

rulings.text: Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” No one can activate any activated abilities, including mana abilities, of a detained permanent.
If a creature is already attacking or blocking when it’s detained, it won’t be removed from combat. It will continue to attack or block.
If a noncreature permanent is detained and later turns into a creature, it won’t be able to attack or block.
If a permanent’s activated ability is on the stack when that permanent is detained, the ability will be unaffected.
The static abilities of a detained permanent still apply. The triggered abilities of a detained permanent can still trigger.

When a player leaves a multiplayer game, any continuous effects with durations that last until that player’s next turn or until a specific point in that turn will last until that turn would have begun. They neither expire immediately nor last indefinitely.

foreignNames.name: Azorius-Eintreiberin
foreignNames.text: Wenn die Azorius-Eintreiberin ins Spiel kommt, inhaftiere eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. (Bis zu deinem nächsten Zug kann diese Kreatur nicht angreifen oder blocken und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Du hast das Recht zu schweigen. Vor allem, weil ich deiner Ausflüchte müde werde."

foreignNames.name: Encarceladora azoria
foreignNames.text: Cuando la Encarceladora azoria entre al campo de batalla, detén la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente. (Hasta tu próximo turno, esa criatura no puede atacar ni bloquear y sus habilidades activadas no pueden activarse.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Tienes derecho a guardar silencio. Más que nada porque me cansan tus excusas."

foreignNames.name: Courtière d'Azorius
foreignNames.text: Quand la Courtière d'Azorius arrive sur le champ de bataille, détenez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle. (Jusqu'à votre prochain tour, cette créature ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Vous avez le droit de garder le silence. Essentiellement parce que je suis lasse d'entendre vos excuses. »

foreignNames.name: Polizia Azorius
foreignNames.text: Quando la Polizia Azorius entra nel campo di battaglia, trattieni una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario. (Fino al tuo prossimo turno, quella creatura non può attaccare o bloccare e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Hai il diritto di rimanere in silenzio. Principalmente perché le chiacchiere mi annoiano."

foreignNames.name: アゾリウスの拘引者
foreignNames.text: アゾリウスの拘引者が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手１人がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを留置する。（あなたの次のターンまで、そのクリーチャーでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士
foreignNames.flavor: 「あなたには黙秘権があります。言い訳をうだうだ聞かされたくないので。」

foreignNames.name: 아조리우스 체포원
foreignNames.text: 아조리우스 체포원이 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 억류한다. (당신의 다음 턴이 될 때까지 그 생물은 공격하거나 방어할 수 없으며, 그 생물의 활성화능력은 활성화될 수 없다.)
foreignNames.flavor: "당신은 묵비권을 행사할 수 있으며, 행사하는 걸 권장한다. 변명을 듣는 것도 지겨우니까."

foreignNames.name: Encarceradora Azorius
foreignNames.text: Quando Encarceradora Azorius entrar no campo de batalha, detenha a criatura alvo que um oponente controla. (Até o seu próximo turno, aquela criatura não pode atacar nem bloquear e as habilidades ativadas dela não podem ser ativadas.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Você tem o direito de permanecer em silêncio. Principalmente porque cansei de suas desculpas."

foreignNames.name: Задержатель Азориусов
foreignNames.text: Когда Задержатель Азориусов выходит на поле битвы, задержите целевое существо под контролем оппонента. (До вашего следующего хода то существо не может атаковать или блокировать, и его активируемые способности не могут быть активированы.)
foreignNames.flavor: «У вас есть право хранить молчание. В основном потому, что я устала слушать оправдания».

foreignNames.name: 俄佐立逮捕人
foreignNames.text: 当俄佐立逮捕人进战场时，拘留目标由对手操控的生物。（直到你的下个回合，该生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「你有权保持缄默。主要是因为我懒得听你找藉口。」

foreignNames.name: 俄佐立逮捕人
foreignNames.text: 當俄佐立逮捕人進戰場時，拘留目標由對手操控的生物。（直到你的下個回合，該生物不能進行攻擊或阻擋，其起動式異能也不能起動。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「你有權保持緘默。主要是因為我懶得聽你找藉口。」

cards.originalText: When Azorius Arrester enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

cards.name: Azorius Justiciar
cards.text: When Azorius Justiciar enters the battlefield, detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)
cards.flavor: "Your potential to commit a crime warrants further investigation."

rulings.text: The two creatures can be controlled by the same opponent or by different opponents.
Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” No one can activate any activated abilities, including mana abilities, of a detained permanent.
If a creature is already attacking or blocking when it’s detained, it won’t be removed from combat. It will continue to attack or block.
If a noncreature permanent is detained and later turns into a creature, it won’t be able to attack or block.
If a permanent’s activated ability is on the stack when that permanent is detained, the ability will be unaffected.
The static abilities of a detained permanent still apply. The triggered abilities of a detained permanent can still trigger.

When a player leaves a multiplayer game, any continuous effects with durations that last until that player’s next turn or until a specific point in that turn will last until that turn would have begun. They neither expire immediately nor last indefinitely.

foreignNames.name: Azorius-Justiziarin

cards.name: Eyes in the Skies
cards.text: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
cards.flavor:
"What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to."
—Zunak, Selesnya strategist

rulings.text: Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the new token will work.
If you choose to copy a creature token that’s a copy of another creature, the new creature token will copy the characteristics of whatever the original token is copying.
If you control no creature tokens when you populate, nothing will happen.
The new creature token copies the characteristics of the original token as stated by the effect that put the original token onto the battlefield.

The new token doesn’t copy whether the original token is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any noncopy effects that have changed its power, toughness, color, and so on.

You can choose any creature token you control for populate. If a spell or ability puts a token onto the battlefield under your control and then instructs you to populate (as Coursers’ Accord does), you may choose to copy the token you just created, or you may choose to copy another creature token you control.

cards.name: Martial Law
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
cards.flavor:
"The good of society matters much more than the inconvenience of a few."
—Agmand Sarv, Azorius hussar

rulings.text: Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” No one can activate any activated abilities, including mana abilities, of a detained permanent.
If a creature is already attacking or blocking when it’s detained, it won’t be removed from combat. It will continue to attack or block.
If a noncreature permanent is detained and later turns into a creature, it won’t be able to attack or block.
If a permanent’s activated ability is on the stack when that permanent is detained, the ability will be unaffected.
The static abilities of a detained permanent still apply. The triggered abilities of a detained permanent can still trigger.

When a player leaves a multiplayer game, any continuous effects with durations that last until that player’s next turn or until a specific point in that turn will last until that turn would have begun. They neither expire immediately nor last indefinitely.

cards.name: Palisade Giant
cards.text: All damage that would be dealt to you and other permanents you control is dealt to Palisade Giant instead.
cards.flavor: Refusing guild allegiances, she fights for those who can't protect themselves.

rulings.text: Applying this redirection effect doesn’t change whether the damage is combat damage.

If you control more than one Palisade Giant, you choose which redirection effect to apply. You can’t divide damage dealt by one source. For example, if an attacking creature would deal 8 damage to you and you control two Palisade Giants, you may have that damage dealt to either of the Palisade Giants. You can’t have 4 damage dealt to each Giant or choose to have the 8 damage dealt to you.

foreignNames.flavor: "In tempi difficili, abbiamo tutti bisogno di qualcuno che ci guardi le spalle."

foreignNames.name: 管区の隊長
foreignNames.text:
先制攻撃
管区の隊長がプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、白の１/１の兵士・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士
foreignNames.flavor: 「物騒な時代だからな、みんな自分の背中を守ってくれる奴が欲しいのさ。」

foreignNames.name: 관할지역 대장
foreignNames.text:
선제공격
관할지역 대장이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 1/1 백색 병사 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "난세에는 누구나 뒤를 봐줄 사람이 필요한 법이지."

foreignNames.name: Capitão da Jurisdição
foreignNames.text:
Iniciativa
Toda vez que Capitão da Jurisdição causar dano de combate a um jogador, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Soldado.
foreignNames.flavor: "Em tempos tumultuosos, todos precisamos de alguém para cuidar de nossa retaguarda."

foreignNames.name: Капитан Округа
foreignNames.text:
Первый удар
Каждый раз, когда Капитан Округа наносит боевые повреждения игроку, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 1/1 белый Солдат.
foreignNames.flavor: «В трудные времена нам всем нужен кто-то, кто сможет прикрыть нашу спину».

foreignNames.name: 城郊队长
foreignNames.text:
先攻
每当城郊队长对一位牌手造成战斗伤害时，将一个1/1白色士兵衍生生物放进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 「危难时，我们都需要有人照应。」

foreignNames.name: 城郊隊長
foreignNames.text:
先攻
每當城郊隊長對一位玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，將一個1/1白色士兵衍生生物放進戰場。
foreignNames.flavor: 「危難時，我們都需要有人照應。」

cards.originalText:
First strike
Whenever Precinct Captain deals combat damage to a player, put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Rest in Peace
cards.text:
When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all graveyards.
If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
cards.flavor: Some corpses the Golgari cannot claim. Some souls the Orzhov cannot shackle.

rulings.text: If Rest in Peace is destroyed by a spell, Rest in Peace will be exiled and then the spell will be put into its owner's graveyard.

If a card is discarded while Rest in Peace is on the battlefield, abilities that function when a card is discarded (such as madness) still work, even though that card never reaches a graveyard. In addition, spells or abilities that check the characteristics of a discarded card (such as Chandra Ablaze's first ability) can find that card in exile.
While Rest in Peace is on the battlefield, abilities that trigger whenever a creature dies won't trigger because cards and tokens are never put into a player's graveyard.

foreignNames.name: In Frieden ruhen
foreignNames.text:
Wenn In Frieden ruhen ins Spiel kommt, schicke alle Karten aus allen Friedhöfen ins Exil.
Falls eine Karte oder ein Spielstein von irgendwoher auf einen Friedhof gelegt würde, schicke sie bzw. ihn stattdessen ins Exil.
foreignNames.flavor: Es gibt Leichen, auf die die Golgari keinen Anspruch erheben können. Es gibt Seelen, die die Orzhov nicht in Ketten legen können.

foreignNames.name: Descanse en paz
foreignNames.text:
Cuando Descanse en paz entre al campo de batalla, exilia todas las cartas de todos los cementerios.
Si una carta o ficha fuera a ser puesta en un cementerio desde cualquier parte, en vez de eso, exíliala.
foreignNames.flavor: Hay cadáveres que los golgari no pueden reclamar. Hay almas que los orzhov no pueden subyugar.

foreignNames.name: Repose en paix
foreignNames.text:
Quand Repose en paix arrive sur le champ de bataille, exilez toutes les cartes de tous les cimetières.
Si une carte ou un jeton devait être mis dans un cimetière d'où qu'il vienne, exilez-le à la place.
foreignNames.flavor: Certains cadavres échappent à l'avidité des Golgari. Certaines âmes échappent à l'esclavage des Orzhov.

foreignNames.name: Riposa in Pace
foreignNames.text:
Quando Riposa in Pace entra nel campo di battaglia, esilia tutte le carte da tutti i cimiteri.
Se una carta o una pedina sta per essere messa in un cimitero da qualsiasi zona, invece esiliala.
foreignNames.flavor: Non tutti i corpi vengono reclamati dai Golgari. Non tutte le anime vengono incatenate dagli Orzhov.

foreignNames.name: 安らかなる眠り
foreignNames.text:
安らかなる眠りが戦場に出たとき、すべての墓地にあるすべてのカードを追放する。
カードかトークンがいずれかの領域からいずれかの墓地に置かれる場合、代わりにそれを追放する。
foreignNames.flavor: ゴルガリが占有できない死体もある。オルゾフが拘束できない魂もある。

foreignNames.name: 평온한 안식
foreignNames.text:
평온한 안식이 전장에 들어올 때, 모든 무덤에서 모든 카드를 추방한다.
카드 또는 토큰이 어디에서부터든 무덤에 들어가려고 한다면, 대신에 그것을 추방한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 골가리 길드가 차지할 수 없는 시체도 있고, 오르조브 길드가 속박할 수 없는 영혼도 있다.

foreignNames.name: Descanse em Paz
foreignNames.text:
Quando Descanse em Paz entrar no campo de batalha, exile todos os cards de todos os cemitérios.
Se um card ou ficha seria colocado em um cemitério vindo de qualquer lugar, em vez disso, exile-o.
foreignNames.flavor: Alguns cadáveres, os Golgari não conseguem reivindicar. Algumas almas, os Orzhov não conseguem agrilhoar.

foreignNames.name: Покойся с Миром
foreignNames.text:
Когда Покойся с Миром выходит на поле битвы, изгоните все карты из всех кладбищ.
Если карта или фишка должна попасть откуда-либо на кладбище, изгоните ее вместо этого.
foreignNames.flavor: Не все тела получат Голгари. Не все души удастся заполучить Орзовам.

foreignNames.name: 得享安息
foreignNames.text:
当得享安息进战场时，放逐所有坟墓场中的所有牌。
如果任一张牌或衍生物将从任何地方置入坟墓场，改为将它放逐。
foreignNames.flavor: 有些尸骸葛加理无法夺取。有些灵魂欧佐夫无法束缚。

foreignNames.name: 得享安息
foreignNames.text:
當得享安息進戰場時，放逐所有墳墓場中的所有牌。
如果任一張牌或衍生物將從任何地方置入墳墓場，改為將它放逐。
foreignNames.flavor: 有些屍骸葛加理無法奪取。有些靈魂歐佐夫無法束縛。

cards.originalText:
When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards.
If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

cards.name: Rootborn Defenses
cards.text: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

rulings.text: Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the new token will work.
If you choose to copy a creature token that’s a copy of another creature, the new creature token will copy the characteristics of whatever the original token is copying.
If you control no creature tokens when you populate, nothing will happen.
The new creature token copies the characteristics of the original token as stated by the effect that put the original token onto the battlefield.

The new token doesn’t copy whether the original token is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any noncopy effects that have changed its power, toughness, color, and so on.

You can choose any creature token you control for populate. If a spell or ability puts a token onto the battlefield under your control and then instructs you to populate (as Coursers’ Accord does), you may choose to copy the token you just created, or you may choose to copy another creature token you control.

Rootborn Defenses affects only creatures you control after populating at the time it resolves. The creature token you create will gain indestructible, but creatures you begin to control later in the turn will not.

foreignNames.name: Verwurzelter Verteidiger
foreignNames.text: Führe Bevölkern durch. Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, sind in diesem Zug unzerstörbar. (Bringe zum Bevölkern einen Spielstein ins Spiel, der eine Kopie eines Kreaturenspielsteins ist, den du kontrollierst. Schaden und Effekte, die „zerstören", zerstören unzerstörbare Kreaturen nicht.)

foreignNames.name: Defensas raiznatas
foreignNames.text: Repuebla. Las criaturas que controlas son indestructibles este turno. (Para repoblar, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha que es una copia de una ficha de criatura que controlas. El daño y los efectos que dicen "destruir" no destruyen a las criaturas indestructibles.)

foreignNames.name: Défenses nées des racines
foreignNames.text: Peuplez. Les créatures que vous contrôlez sont indestructibles ce tour-ci. (Pour peupler, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton qui est une copie d'un jeton de créature que vous contrôlez. Les blessures et les effets qui disent « détruisez » ne détruisent pas les créatures indestructibles.)

foreignNames.name: Difese delle Radici
foreignNames.text: Popola. Le creature che controlli sono indistruttibili in questo turno. (Per popolare, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina che è una copia di una pedina creatura che controlli. Il danno e gli effetti che dicono "distruggi" non distruggono le creature indistruttibili.)

foreignNames.name: 根生まれの防衛
foreignNames.text: 居住を行う。このターン、あなたがコントロールするクリーチャーは破壊されない。（居住を行うには、あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー・トークン１体のコピーであるトークンを１体戦場に出す。破壊されないクリーチャーは、ダメージや"破壊する"効果では破壊されない。）

foreignNames.name: 뿌리 깊은 방어
foreignNames.text: 소집한다. 당신이 조종하는 생물들은 이 턴에 파괴될 수 없다. (소집하려면 당신이 조종하는 어느 생물 토큰의 복사본인 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다. 파괴될 수 없는 생물은 피해나 "파괴"라고 명시된 효과에 의해 파괴되지 않는다.)

foreignNames.name: Defensores Radiconatos
foreignNames.text: Povoe. As criaturas que você controla são indestrutíveis neste turno. (Para povoar, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha que seja uma cópia de uma ficha de criatura que você controle. Os dano e efeitos que dizem "destrua" não destroem criaturas indestrutíveis.)

foreignNames.name: Защитная Магия Корней
foreignNames.text: Используйте Заселение. Существа под вашим контролем не могут быть уничтожены в этом ходу. (Для Заселения положите на поле битвы одну фишку, являющуюся копией фишки существа под вашим контролем. Повреждения и эффекты с указанием «уничтожьте» не уничтожают неуничтожаемые существа.)

foreignNames.name: 根生卫护
foreignNames.text: 殖民。由你操控的生物本回合不会毁坏。（殖民的方法，是将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。伤害与注明「消灭」的效应无法消灭不会毁坏的生物。）

foreignNames.name: 根生衛護
foreignNames.text: 殖民。由你操控的生物本回合不會毀壞。（殖民的方法，是將一個衍生物放進戰場，此衍生物為由你操控的某衍生生物之複製品。傷害與註明「消滅」的效應無法消滅不會毀壞的生物。）

cards.originalText: Populate. Creatures you control are indestructible this turn. (To populate, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy indestructible creatures.)

cards.name: Security Blockade
cards.text:
Enchant land
When Security Blockade enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn."

rulings.text: You must target a land to cast Security Blockade. If that land is an illegal target when Security Blockade tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and won’t enter the battlefield. You won’t get the Knight token.

foreignNames.name: Absichernde Sperre
foreignNames.text:
Landverzauberung
Wenn die Absichernde Sperre ins Spiel kommt, bringe einen 2/2 weißen Ritter-Kreaturenspielstein mit Wachsamkeit ins Spiel.
Das verzauberte Land hat „{T}: Verhindere den nächsten 1 Schadenspunkt, der dir in diesem Zug zugefügt würde."

foreignNames.name: Bloqueo de seguridad
foreignNames.text:
Encantar tierra.
Cuando el Bloqueo de seguridad entre al campo de batalla, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Caballero blanca 2/2 con la habilidad de vigilancia.
La tierra encantada tiene "{T}: Prevén el siguiente 1 punto de daño que se te fuera a hacer este turno".

foreignNames.name: Blocus de sécurité
foreignNames.text:
Enchanter : terrain
Quand le Blocus de sécurité arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 2/2 blanche Chevalier avec la vigilance.
Le terrain enchanté a « {T} : Prévenez la prochaine 1 blessure qui devrait vous être infligée ce tour-ci. »

foreignNames.name: Posto di Blocco
foreignNames.text:
Incanta terra
Quando il Posto di Blocco entra nel campo di battaglia, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Cavaliere 2/2 bianca con cautela.
La terra incantata ha "{T}: Previeni il prossimo 1 danno che ti verrebbe inflitto in questo turno".

foreignNames.name: 封鎖作戦
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（土地）
封鎖作戦が戦場に出たとき、警戒を持つ白の２/２の騎士・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
エンチャントされている土地は「{T}：このターン、次にあなたに与えられるダメージを１点軽減する。」を持つ。
foreignNames.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignNames.name: 보안 봉쇄
foreignNames.text:
대지에게 부여
보안 봉쇄가 전장에 들어올 때, 경계 능력을 가진 2/2 백색 기사 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
부여된 대지는 "{T}: 이 턴에 다음으로 당신이 입을 피해 1점을 방지한다."라는 능력을 가진다.

foreignNames.name: Bloqueio de Segurança
foreignNames.text:
Encantar terreno
Quando Bloqueio de Segurança entrar no campo de batalha, coloque uma ficha de criatura branca 2/2 do tipo Cavaleiro com vigilância no campo de batalha.
O terreno encantado tem "{T}: Previna o próximo 1 ponto de dano que seria causado a você neste turno."

foreignNames.name: Блокада Безопасности
foreignNames.text:
Зачаровать землю
Когда Блокада Безопасности выходит на поле битвы, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 2/2 белый Рыцарь с Бдительностью.
Зачарованная земля имеет способность «{T}: предотвратите следующее 1 повреждение, которое должно быть нанесено вам в этом ходу».

foreignNames.name: 维安封锁
foreignNames.text:
结附于地
当维安封锁进战场时，将一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的骑士衍生生物放进战场。
所结附的地具有「{T}：于本回合中，防止接下来将对你造成的1点伤害。」

foreignNames.name: 維安封鎖
foreignNames.text:
結附於地
當維安封鎖進戰場時，將一個2/2白色，具警戒異能的騎士衍生生物放進戰場。
所結附的地具有「{T}：於本回合中，防止接下來將對你造成的1點傷害。」

cards.originalText:
Enchant land
When Security Blockade enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance onto the battlefield.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn."

cards.name: Selesnya Sentry
cards.text: {5}{G}: Regenerate Selesnya Sentry.
cards.flavor: Ravnicans still tell tales about the Battle of Sumala where four Selesnya sentries held off an entire clan of Gruul warriors.

foreignNames.name: Selesnija-Wachposten
foreignNames.text: {5}{G}: Regeneriere den Selesnija-Wachposten.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Ravnicaner erzählen immer noch Geschichten von der Schlacht von Sumala, in der vier Selesnija-Wachposten einen ganzen Clan von Gruul-Kriegern aufhielten.

foreignNames.name: Centinela selesnya
foreignNames.text: {5}{G}: Regenera el Centinela selesnya.
foreignNames.flavor: Los habitantes de Rávnica aún cuentan historias de la batalla de Sumala, donde cuatro centinelas selesnya contuvieron a un clan entero de guerreros gruul.

foreignNames.name: Sentinelle de Selesnya
foreignNames.text: {5}{G} : Régénérez la Sentinelle de Selesnya.
foreignNames.flavor: Les Ravnicans racontent encore la bataille de Sumala, où quatre sentinelles de Selesnya tinrent tête à tout un clan de guerriers Gruul.

foreignNames.name: Sentinella di Selesnya
foreignNames.text: {5}{G}: Rigenera la Sentinella di Selesnya.
foreignNames.flavor: La gente di Ravnica racconta ancora oggi la storia delle quattro sentinelle di Selesnya che respinsero un intero clan di guerrieri Gruul nella Battaglia di Sumala.

foreignNames.name: セレズニアの歩哨
foreignNames.text: {5}{G}：セレズニアの歩哨を再生する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 象・兵士
foreignNames.flavor: セレズニアの歩哨４名がグルール一族の戦士の一団を撃退したスマーラの戦いは、いまだにラヴニカ人によって語り継がれている。

foreignNames.name: 셀레스냐 보초병
foreignNames.text: {5}{G}: 셀레스냐 보초병을 재생한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 셀레스냐 보초병 네 명이 하나의 그룰 전사 부족 전체를 막아낸 수말라 전투는 지금도 라브니카인들 사이에서 회자된다.

foreignNames.name: Sentinela Selesnya
foreignNames.text: {5}{G}: Regenere Sentinela Selesnya.
foreignNames.flavor: Os ravnicanos ainda contam histórias sobre a Batalha de Sumala, onde quatro sentinelas Selesnya contiveram um clã inteiro de guerreiros Gruul.

foreignNames.name: Часовой Селезнии
foreignNames.text: {5}{G}: регенерируйте Часового Селезнии.
foreignNames.flavor: Обитатели Равники до сих пор вспоминают, как во время битвы при Сумале четверо селезнийских часовых сдерживали целый клан груульских воинов.

foreignNames.name: 瑟雷尼亚哨兵
foreignNames.text: {5}{G}：重生瑟雷尼亚哨兵。
foreignNames.flavor: 拉尼卡子民到现在依然传颂着索马拉之役的壮烈事迹，那时四名瑟雷尼亚哨兵挡住了一整族的古鲁战士。

foreignNames.name: 瑟雷尼亞哨兵
foreignNames.text: {5}{G}：重生瑟雷尼亞哨兵。
foreignNames.flavor: 拉尼卡子民到現在依然傳頌著索馬拉之役的壯烈事蹟，那時四名瑟雷尼亞哨兵擋住了一整族的古魯戰士。

cards.originalText: {5}{G}: Regenerate Selesnya Sentry.

cards.name: Seller of Songbirds
cards.text: When Seller of Songbirds enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.
cards.flavor:
"Lady Wren is the one merchant in Keyhole Downs who isn't running a scam."
—Mirela, Azorius hussar

foreignNames.name: Singvogelhändlerin
foreignNames.text: Wenn die Singvogelhändlerin ins Spiel kommt, bringe einen 1/1 weißen Vogel-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Zaunkönigin ist die einzige Händlerin in der Schlüssellochtiefe, die niemanden betrügt." —Mirela, Azorius-Husarin

foreignNames.name: Vendedora de aves cantoras
foreignNames.text: Cuando la Vendedora de aves cantoras entre al campo de batalla, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Ave blanca 1/1 con la habilidad de volar.
foreignNames.flavor: "La dama Wren es la única comerciante de Bajos de Cerradura que no tima a sus clientes." —Mirela, húsar azoria

foreignNames.name: Marchande de passereaux
foreignNames.text: Quand la Marchande de passereaux arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Oiseau avec le vol.
foreignNames.flavor: « Dame Roitelet est la seule marchande des Collines de la Serrure qui n'arnaque pas trop son monde. » —Mirela, hussarde d'Azorius

foreignNames.name: Venditrice di Uccellini Canori
foreignNames.text: Quando la Venditrice di Uccellini Canori entra nel campo di battaglia, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Uccello 1/1 bianca con volare.
foreignNames.flavor: "Lady Scricciolo è l'unico mercante onesto delle Serrature Sotterranee." —Mirela, ussara Azorius

foreignNames.name: 歌鳥の売り手
foreignNames.text: 歌鳥の売り手が戦場に出たとき、飛行を持つ白の１/１の鳥・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間
foreignNames.flavor: 「鍵穴市場でインチキ商売をしていないのはレディ・レンただ１人よ。」 ――アゾリウスの騎兵、ミレーラ

foreignNames.name: 명금 상인
foreignNames.text: 명금 상인이 전장에 들어올 때, 비행 능력을 가진 1/1 백색 조류 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.

Enchant nonland permanent
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted permanent's controller, that player sacrifices it unless they pay {X}, where X is its mana value.

rulings.text: If the permanent has {X} in its mana cost, X is 0.
The converted mana cost of a creature token is 0, unless that token is a copy of another creature, in which case it copies that creature’s mana cost.

cards.name: Sphere of Safety
cards.text: Creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {X} for each of those creatures, where X is the number of enchantments you control.
cards.flavor: The Rakdos believe that all are eager to join their revels, even when told otherwise.

rulings.text: If you control Sphere of Safety, your opponents can choose not to attack with a creature with an ability that says it attacks if able.

foreignNames.name: Sicherheitssphäre
foreignNames.text: Kreaturen können dich oder einen Planeswalker, den du kontrollierst, nicht angreifen, falls ihr Beherrscher nicht für jede dieser Kreaturen {X} bezahlt, wobei X die Anzahl an Verzauberungen ist, die du kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Rakdos sind überzeugt, dass alle auf ihre Orgien versessen sind, selbst wenn man das Gegenteil behauptet.

foreignNames.name: Esfera de seguridad
foreignNames.text: Las criaturas no pueden atacarte a ti ni a un planeswalker que controlas a menos que su controlador pague {X} por cada una de esas criaturas, donde X es el número de encantamientos que controlas.
foreignNames.flavor: Los rakdos creen que todos están ansiosos por unirse a sus festejos, incluso cuando alguien lo niega.

foreignNames.name: Sphère de sécurité
foreignNames.text: Les créatures ne peuvent pas vous attaquer ou attaquer un planeswalker que vous contrôlez à moins que leur contrôleur ne paie {X} pour chacune de ces créatures, X étant le nombre d'enchantements que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor: Les Rakdos sont convaincus que tout le monde rêve de prendre part à leurs festivités, même quand on leur affirme le contraire.

foreignNames.name: Sfera della Sicurezza
foreignNames.text: Le creature non possono attaccare te o un planeswalker che controlli a meno che il loro controllore non paghi {X} per ciascuna di quelle creature, dove X è pari al numero di incantesimi che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor: Anche se rassicurati del contrario, i Rakdos pensano che tutti siano ansiosi di partecipare alle loro gozzoviglie.

foreignNames.name: 安全の領域
foreignNames.text: クリーチャーは、そのコントローラーが攻撃クリーチャーにつき{X}を支払わない限り、あなたやあなたがコントロールするプレインズウォーカーを攻撃できない。Ｘはあなたがコントロールするエンチャントの総数に等しい。
foreignNames.flavor: ラクドス教徒は誰もが彼らの乱痴気騒ぎに参加したがっていると信じている。たとえそうではないと告げられても、である。

foreignNames.name: 안전의 구체
foreignNames.text: 각 생물에 대해 그 생물의 조종자가 {X}를 지불하지 않는 한, 생물들은 당신 또는 당신이 조종하는 플레인즈워커를 공격할 수 없다. X는 당신이 조종하는 부여마법의 수다.
foreignNames.flavor: 락도스 길드원들은 모두가 말로는 싫다고 해도 실은 그들의 광란에 참여하고 싶어 한다고 믿는다.

foreignNames.name: Esfera de Segurança
foreignNames.text: As criaturas não podem atacar você nem um planeswalker que você controle a menos que seu controlador pague {X} para cada uma das criaturas, sendo X igual ao número de encantamentos que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor: Os Rakdos acreditam que todos estão ansiosos para participar de suas celebrações, mesmo quando são informados do contrário.

foreignNames.name: Сфера Безопасности

foreignNames.flavor: Ракдосы верят, что каждый мечтает присоединиться к их пирушкам, даже если им говорят обратное.

foreignNames.name: 安全球罩
foreignNames.text: 对每个生物而言，除非其操控者为其支付{X}，否则它不能攻击你或由你操控的鹏洛客，X为由你操控的结界之数量。
