cards.originalText: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Trostani's Judgment
cards.text: Exile target creature, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
cards.flavor:
"Some cannot be saved as they are, but all can serve the Worldsoul."
—Trostani

rulings.text: If you choose a creature token you control as the target, it will be exiled before you populate and you won’t be able to choose that creature to copy.

You must target a creature to cast Trostani’s Judgment. If that creature is an illegal target when Trostani’s Judgment tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t populate.
Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the new token will work.
If you choose to copy a creature token that’s a copy of another creature, the new creature token will copy the characteristics of whatever the original token is copying.
If you control no creature tokens when you populate, nothing will happen.
The new creature token copies the characteristics of the original token as stated by the effect that put the original token onto the battlefield.

The new token doesn’t copy whether the original token is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any noncopy effects that have changed its power, toughness, color, and so on.

You can choose any creature token you control for populate. If a spell or ability puts a token onto the battlefield under your control and then instructs you to populate (as Coursers’ Accord does), you may choose to copy the token you just created, or you may choose to copy another creature token you control.

foreignNames.name: Trostanis Abrechnung
foreignNames.text: Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl ins Exil und führe dann Bevölkern durch. (Bringe einen Spielstein ins Spiel, der eine Kopie eines Kreaturenspielsteins ist, den du kontrollierst.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Nicht alle können in ihrer derzeitigen Gestalt gerettet werden, aber alle können der Weltenseele dienen." —Trostani

foreignNames.name: Juicio de Trostani
foreignNames.text: Exilia a la criatura objetivo, luego repuebla. (Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha que es una copia de una ficha de criatura que controlas.)
foreignNames.flavor: "A algunos ya no se les puede salvar, pero todos pueden servir al Alma del mundo." —Trostani

foreignNames.name: Jugement selon Trostani
foreignNames.text: Exilez la créature ciblée, puis peuplez. (Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton qui est une copie d'un jeton de créature que vous contrôlez.)
foreignNames.flavor: « À défaut d'être sauvés tels qu'ils sont, certains peuvent servir l'Âme du monde. » —Trostani

foreignNames.name: Sentenza di Trostani
foreignNames.text: Esilia una creatura bersaglio, poi popola. (Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina che è una copia di una pedina creatura che controlli.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Alcuni non possono essere salvati nello stato in cui si trovano, ma tutti possono servire l'Anima del Mondo." —Trostani

foreignNames.name: トロスターニの裁き
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを追放する。その後居住を行う。（あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー・トークン１体のコピーであるトークンを１体戦場に出す。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「そのままでは救いを与えられない者もいます。しかし世界魂には誰しもが奉仕できるのです。」 ――トロスターニ

foreignNames.name: 트로스타니의 심판
foreignNames.text: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 추방한 후, 소집한다. (당신이 조종하는 어느 생물 토큰의 복사본인 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.)
foreignNames.flavor: "현재 상태로는 구원을 받을 수 없는 자도 세계의 영혼을 섬길 수 있다." —트로스타니

foreignNames.name: Julgamento de Trostani
foreignNames.text: Exile a criatura alvo e depois povoe. (Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha que seja uma cópia de uma ficha de criatura que você controla.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Alguns não podem ser salvos em seu estado atual, mas todos podem servir à Grande Anima." — Trostani

foreignNames.name: Суд Тростани
foreignNames.text: Изгоните целевое существо, затем используйте Заселение. (Положите на поле битвы одну фишку, являющуюся копией фишки существа под вашим контролем.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Не все останутся собой, но все смогут послужить Всесознанию». — Тростани

foreignNames.name: 卓塔妮的判决
foreignNames.text: 放逐目标生物，然后殖民。（将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「有些人已无可救药，但人人都能服侍世界之魂。」 ～卓塔妮

foreignNames.name: 卓塔妮的判決
foreignNames.text: 放逐目標生物，然後殖民。（將一個衍生物放進戰場，此衍生物為由你操控的某衍生生物之複製品。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「有些人已無可救藥，但人人都能服侍世界之魂。」 ～卓塔妮

cards.originalText: Exile target creature, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

cards.name: Aquus Steed
cards.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: In water, it's as graceful as a dolphin. On land, it darts and jerks so unpredictably that few can ride it for long.

foreignNames.name: Aquagaul
foreignNames.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält -2/-0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Im Wasser bewegt er sich elegant wie ein Delfin. Doch an Land ist sein Gang so ruckartig und unberechenbar, dass nur wenige Reiter sich lange auf ihm halten können.

foreignNames.name: Corcel aquus
foreignNames.text: {2}{U}, {T}: La criatura objetivo obtiene -2/-0 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: En el agua, es tan grácil como un delfín. En tierra, da unos tirones y sacudidas tan impredecibles que pocos pueden montarlo durante mucho tiempo.

foreignNames.name: Destrier aquus
foreignNames.text: {2}{U}, {T} : La créature ciblée gagne -2/-0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Dans l'eau, il a la grâce d'un dauphin. Sur la terre ferme, il piaffe et bondit de façon si imprévisible que peu tiennent longtemps en selle.

foreignNames.name: Destriero Aquino
foreignNames.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Una creatura bersaglio prende -2/-0 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Nell'acqua ha la grazia di un delfino. Sulla terra scatta e sobbalza in modo così imprevedibile che pochi riescono a cavalcarlo a lungo.

foreignNames.name: 水馬
foreignNames.text: {2}{U}, {T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで－２/－０の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ビースト
foreignNames.flavor: 水中にあってはイルカのごとく優雅である。しかし地上ではまったく予測不可能な方向へ飛び跳ねるため、長時間乗っていられる者は少ない。

foreignNames.name: 아쿠스 준마
foreignNames.text: {2}{U}, {T}: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -2/-0을 받는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 물속에서는 돌고래만큼 우아하지만, 육지에서는 제멋대로 날뛰어서 오래 탈 수 있는 자가 거의 없다.

foreignNames.name: Corcel Aquus
foreignNames.text: {2}{U}, {T}: A criatura alvo recebe -2/-0 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Na água, ele é gracioso como um golfinho. Na terra, ele dispara e se sacode de forma tão imprevisível que poucos conseguem montá-lo por muito tempo.

foreignNames.name: Жеребец Аквус
foreignNames.text: {2}{U}, {T}: целевое существо получает -2/-0 до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: В воде он проворен как дельфин. На суше его движения настолько быстры и непредсказуемы, что мало кто сможет усидеть на его спине.

foreignNames.name: 水驹
foreignNames.text: {2}{U}，{T}：目标生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 在水里，他如同海豚一般优雅。在陆地，他的脾性古怪，少有人能驾驭。

foreignNames.name: 水駒
foreignNames.text: {2}{U}，{T}：目標生物得-2/-0直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 在水裡，牠如同海豚一般優雅。在陸地，牠的脾性古怪，少有人能駕馭。

cards.originalText: {2}{U}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Blustersquall
cards.text:
Tap target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")
cards.flavor: Weather is more predictable than the Izzet.

rulings.text: Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.
If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.

foreignNames.name: Brausende Böe
foreignNames.text:
Tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du nicht kontrollierst.
Überlast {3}{U} (Du kannst diesen Zauber für seine Überlast-Kosten wirken. Falls du dies tust, verändere seinen Text, indem du im Text alle Vorkommen von „deiner Wahl" durch „jeder" ersetzt.)
foreignNames.flavor: Beim Wetter weiß man eher als bei den Izzet, woran man ist.

foreignNames.name: Bramarráfaga
foreignNames.text:
Gira la criatura objetivo que no controlas.
Sobrecarga {3}{U}. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo por su coste de sobrecarga. Si lo haces, cambia su texto reemplazando "la criatura objetivo" por "cada criatura".)
foreignNames.flavor: El clima es más predecible que los ízzet.

foreignNames.name: Forte bourrasque
foreignNames.text:
Engagez une créature ciblée que vous ne contrôlez pas.
Surcharge {3}{U} (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort pour son coût de surcharge. Si vous faites ainsi, modifiez son texte en remplaçant toutes les occurrences de « ciblé(e) » par « chaque ».)
foreignNames.flavor: Les intempéries sont plus prévisibles que les Izzet.

foreignNames.name: Turbinante
foreignNames.text:
TAPpa una creatura bersaglio che non controlli.
Sovraccarico {3}{U} (Puoi lanciare questa magia per il suo costo di sovraccarico. Se lo fai, cambiane il testo sostituendo "una creatura bersaglio" con "ogni creatura".)
foreignNames.flavor: È più facile predire il tempo che non gli Izzet.

foreignNames.name: 暴突風
foreignNames.text:
あなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。
超過 {3}{U} （あなたはこの呪文をその超過コストで唱えてもよい。そうした場合、あなたがコントロールしていない各クリーチャーをそれぞれタップする。）
foreignNames.flavor: イゼットよりは天気の方が読みやすい。

foreignNames.name: 강력돌풍
foreignNames.text:
당신이 조종하지 않는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 탭한다.
과부하 {3}{U} (당신은 과부하 비용을 지불하여 이 주문을 발동할 수 있다. 그럴 경우, 이 주문은 "당신이 조종하지 않는 각 생물을 탭한다"로 내용이 변한다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 이젯 길드의 행동을 예측하는 건 날씨를 예측하는 것보다도 어렵다.

foreignNames.name: Rajada Tempestuosa
foreignNames.text:
Vire a criatura alvo que você não controla.
Sobrecarga {3}{U} (Você pode conjurar esta mágica pagando seu custo de sobrecarga. Se fizer isso, altere seu texto substituindo todas as ocorrências de "a criatura alvo" por "cada criatura".)
foreignNames.flavor: O clima é mais previsível do que os Izzet.

foreignNames.name: Шквальный Удар
foreignNames.text:
Поверните целевое существо не под вашим контролем.
Перегрузка {3}{U} (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание за его стоимость Перегрузки. Если вы это делаете, измените в его тексте все слова «целевой» на «каждый».)
foreignNames.flavor: Проще предсказывать погоду, чем поступки Иззетов.

foreignNames.name: 压制风
foreignNames.text:
横置目标不由你操控的生物。
超载{3}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）
foreignNames.flavor: 预测气候比预测伊捷容易。

foreignNames.name: 壓制風
foreignNames.text:
橫置目標不由你操控的生物。
超載{3}{U}（你可以支付此咒語的超載費用來施放它。如果你如此作，將其中的「目標」字樣全部更改為「每個」。）
foreignNames.flavor: 預測氣候比預測伊捷容易。

cards.originalText:
Tap target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

cards.name: Cancel
cards.text: Counter target spell.
cards.flavor:
"It is forbidden. Asking why is irrelevant."
—Sergiu, Opal Lake magistrate

foreignNames.name: Abbrechen
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: „Es ist verboten. Die Frage nach dem Warum ist irrelevant." —Sergiu, Opalsee-Magistrat

foreignNames.name: Deshacer
foreignNames.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Está prohibido. El por qué es irrelevante." —Sergiu, magistrado del Lago Ópalo

foreignNames.name: Révocation
foreignNames.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor: « C'est interdit. Inutile de demander pourquoi. » —Sergiu, magistrat du Lac d'opale

foreignNames.name: Eliminare
foreignNames.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "È proibito. Chiedere perché è irrilevante." —Sergiu, magistrato del Lago Opale

foreignNames.name: 取り消し
foreignNames.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。
foreignNames.flavor: 「それは禁止だ。理由を訊いてどうする。」 ――オパール湖の行政官、サージョ

foreignNames.name: 주문 취소
foreignNames.text: 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "금지 사항이다. 이유를 묻는 건 부질없는 짓이다." —오팔 호수의 치안 판사 세르지우

foreignNames.name: Cancelar
foreignNames.text: Anule a mágica alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "É proibido. Perguntar o porquê é irrelevante." — Sergiu, magistrado do Lago de Opala

foreignNames.name: Отмена
foreignNames.text: Отмените целевое заклинание.
foreignNames.flavor: «Это запрещено. Нет смысла узнавать причины». — Сержиу, магистрат Опалового озера

foreignNames.name: 取消
foreignNames.text: 反击目标咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 「这不被允许。不需要问为什么。」 ～清辉湖执政官瑟久

foreignNames.name: 取消
foreignNames.text: 反擊目標咒語。
foreignNames.flavor: 「這不被允許。不需要問為什麼。」 ～清輝湖執政官瑟久

cards.originalText: Counter target spell.

cards.name: Chronic Flooding
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller mills three cards.
cards.flavor: With the Izzet occupied elsewhere, many of their public works fell into disrepair.

rulings.text: Chronic Flooding becoming attached to a tapped land won’t cause its ability to immediately trigger. That land must go from untapped to tapped.
Chronic Flooding’s ability will trigger whenever the enchanted land becomes tapped for any reason, not just because its controller taps it for mana.

foreignNames.name: Chronische Überflutung
foreignNames.text:
Landverzauberung
Immer wenn das verzauberte Land getappt wird, legt sein Beherrscher die obersten drei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.
foreignNames.flavor: Während die Izzet anderweitig beschäftigt waren, verfielen viele ihrer öffentlichen Baustellen.

foreignNames.name: Inundación crónica
foreignNames.text:
Encantar tierra.
Siempre que la tierra encantada sea girada, su controlador pone las tres primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.
foreignNames.flavor: Con los ízzet ocupados en otros lugares, muchas de sus obras públicas se deterioraron.

foreignNames.name: Inondations chroniques
foreignNames.text:
Enchanter : terrain
À chaque fois que le terrain enchanté devient engagé, son contrôleur met les trois cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: Les Izzet étant occupés ailleurs, bon nombre de leurs ouvrages publics commençaient à tomber en ruines.

foreignNames.name: Inondazione Cronica
foreignNames.text:
Incanta terra
Ogniqualvolta la terra incantata viene TAPpata, il suo controllore mette le prime tre carte del suo grimorio nel suo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: Con gli Izzet occupati altrove, molte delle loro opere pubbliche caddero in rovina.

foreignNames.name: 慢性的な水害
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（土地）
エンチャントされている土地がタップ状態になるたび、それのコントローラーは自分のライブラリーの一番上から３枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。
foreignNames.type: エンチャント — オーラ
foreignNames.flavor: イゼット団が別件にかまっている間に、彼らの公共施設の多くが荒廃してしまった。

foreignNames.name: 계속되는 홍수
foreignNames.text:
대지에게 부여
부여된 대지가 탭될 때마다, 그 대지의 조종자는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 세 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 이젯 길드가 다른 일에 집중하는 사이, 그들의 공공 사업 중 상당수가 방치되었다.

foreignNames.name: Alagamento Crônico
foreignNames.text:
Encantar terreno
Toda vez que o terreno encantado é virado, seu controlador coloca os três cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.
foreignNames.flavor: Com os Izzet ocupados em outro lugar, muitas de suas obras públicas ficaram sem manutenção.

foreignNames.name: Длительное Затопление
foreignNames.text:
Зачаровать землю
Каждый раз, когда зачарованная земля становится повернутой, контролирующий ее игрок кладет три верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.
foreignNames.flavor: Пока Иззеты были заняты другими делами, многие возведенные ими общественные сооружения приходили в упадок.

foreignNames.name: 长期水患
foreignNames.text:
结附于地
每当所结附的地成为横置时，其操控者将其牌库顶的三张牌置入其坟墓场。
foreignNames.flavor: 由于伊捷正忙于其他事务，许多公共建设面临失修。

foreignNames.name: 長期水患
foreignNames.text:
結附於地
每當所結附的地成為橫置時，其操控者將其牌庫頂的三張牌置入其墳墓場。
foreignNames.flavor: 由於伊捷正忙於其他事務，許多公共建設面臨失修。

cards.originalText:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Conjured Currency
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exchange control of Conjured Currency and target permanent you neither own nor control.
cards.flavor: A bargain in Keyhole Downs is always too good to be true.

rulings.text: The exchange occurs only if Conjured Currency and the target permanent are both on the battlefield and controlled by different players when the ability resolves. In addition, the target permanent must be one you neither own nor control. If any of these things aren’t true when the ability tries to resolve, the exchange won’t happen and neither permanent will change controllers.

The only legal target for Conjured Currency’s ability is a permanent both owned and controlled by another player, although it doesn’t have to be the same player. For example, a permanent owned by an opponent but controlled by your teammate (or another opponent) could be chosen as the target.

You don’t necessarily have to control Conjured Currency when its ability resolves in order for the exchange to happen. If another player has gained control of Conjured Currency while the ability is on the stack, and a third player controls the target (and you don’t own it), you may choose to have those two players exchange control of the relevant permanents.

foreignNames.name: Gezaubertes Geld
foreignNames.text: Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments kannst du die Kontrolle über das Gezauberte Geld und eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die du weder besitzt noch kontrollierst, tauschen.
foreignNames.flavor: Ein gutes Geschäft in der Schlüssellochtiefe ist immer zu schön, um wahr zu sein.

foreignNames.name: Monedas evocadas
foreignNames.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes intercambiar el control de Monedas evocadas y el permanente objetivo que no controlas y del cual no eres propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Una ganga en Bajos de Cerradura siempre es demasiado buena para ser cierta.

foreignNames.name: Monnaie conjurée
foreignNames.text: Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez échanger le contrôle de la Monnaie conjurée contre celui d'un permanent ciblé que vous ne possédez pas et ne contrôlez pas.
foreignNames.flavor: Un bon plan aux Collines de la Serrure est invariablement trop beau pour être vrai.

foreignNames.name: Moneta Evocata
foreignNames.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi scambiare il controllo della Moneta Evocata e di un permanente bersaglio di cui non sei né proprietario né controllore.
foreignNames.flavor: Un buon affare nelle Serrature Sotterranee è sempre troppo buono per essere vero.

foreignNames.name: 妖術による金
foreignNames.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがオーナーでもコントローラーでもないパーマネント１つを対象とする。あなたはそれと妖術による金とのコントロールを交換してもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: 鍵穴市場にあるお買い得品は、「うますぎる話」だと思って間違いない。

foreignNames.name: 마술로 만들어낸 화폐
foreignNames.text: 당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신이 소유하지도 조종하지도 않는 지속물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 당신은 그 지속물과 마술로 만들어낸 화폐의 조종권을 교환할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: 키홀 다운스 시장의 가격은 언제나 믿을 수 없을 만큼 싸다.

foreignNames.name: Moeda Conjurada
foreignNames.text: No início de sua manutenção, você pode permutar o controle de Moeda Conjurada pelo da permanente alvo que você não possua nem controle.
foreignNames.flavor: Uma barganha na Baixa do Buraco da Fechadura é sempre boa demais para ser verdade.

foreignNames.name: Волшебные Деньги
foreignNames.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки вы можете поменяться контролем над Волшебными Деньгами и целевым перманентом, владельцем которого вы не являетесь и который не находится под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor: Сделки в Скважинном Спуске слишком удачны, чтобы быть честными.

foreignNames.name: 变出货币
foreignNames.text: 在你的维持开始时，你可以交换变出货币和目标永久物的操控权，且后者须不由你拥有也不由你操控。
foreignNames.flavor: 锁眼市集的折扣通常暗藏玄机。

foreignNames.name: 變出貨幣
foreignNames.text: 在你的維持開始時，你可以交換變出貨幣和目標永久物的操控權，且後者須不由你擁有也不由你操控。
foreignNames.flavor: 鎖眼市集的折扣通常暗藏玄機。

cards.originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exchange control of Conjured Currency and target permanent you neither own nor control.

cards.name: Crosstown Courier
cards.text: Whenever Crosstown Courier deals combat damage to a player, that player mills that many cards.
cards.flavor: Information travels quickly through Ravnica's network of messengers and thought agents.

foreignNames.name: Stadtquerender Kurier
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Stadtquerende Kurier einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, legt dieser Spieler entsprechend viele Karten oben von seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.
foreignNames.flavor: Neuigkeiten verbreiten sich rasch über Ravnicas Netzwerk von Boten und Gedankenagenten.

foreignNames.name: Mensajero transurbano
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Mensajero transurbano haga daño de combate a un jugador, ese jugador pone esa misma cantidad de cartas de la parte superior de su biblioteca en su cementerio.
foreignNames.flavor: La información viaja velozmente a través de la red de mensajeros y agentes del pensamiento de Rávnica.

foreignNames.name: Messager interville
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que le Messager interville inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, ce joueur met autant de cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: Les informations circulent vite sur Ravnica, grâce à son réseau de messagers et d'agents des pensées.

foreignNames.name: Corriere che Attraversa la Città
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta il Corriere che Attraversa la Città infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, quel giocatore mette nel suo cimitero altrettante carte dalla cima del suo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: Le informazioni viaggiano veloci attraverso la rete di messaggeri e agenti mentali di Ravnica.

foreignNames.name: 都市内の急使
foreignNames.text: 都市内の急使がプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、そのプレイヤーはその点数に等しい枚数のカードを自分のライブラリーの一番上から自分の墓地に置く。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ヴィダルケン
foreignNames.flavor: ラヴニカでは各地に散らばる伝令や思想工作員を通じて情報が瞬く間に広まっていく。

foreignNames.name: 도시를 가로지르는 전령
foreignNames.text: 도시를 가로지르는 전령이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위에서 그만큼의 카드를 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 라브니카의 모든 정보는 전령과 생각 요원을 통해 빠르게 전달된다.

foreignNames.name: Mensageiro Transurbano
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que Mensageiro Transurbano causa dano de combate a um jogador, aquele jogador coloca uma quantidade equivalente de cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.
foreignNames.flavor: A informação viaja rápido pela rede de mensageiros e agentes do pensamento de Ravnica.

foreignNames.name: Городской Посыльный
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда Городской Посыльный наносит боевые повреждения игроку, тот игрок кладет такое же количество карт с верха своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.
foreignNames.flavor: Информация быстро расходится по Равнике при помощи сети посыльных и телепатов.

foreignNames.name: 跨镇讯使
foreignNames.text: 每当跨镇讯使对一位牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手将其牌库顶等量的牌置入其坟墓场。
foreignNames.flavor: 拜信驿网络以及密探之赐，拉尼卡的消息传送非常迅速。

foreignNames.name: 跨鎮訊使
foreignNames.text: 每當跨鎮訊使對一位玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，該玩家將其牌庫頂等量的牌置入其墳墓場。
foreignNames.flavor: 拜信驛網絡以及密探之賜，拉尼卡的消息傳送非常迅速。

cards.originalText: Whenever Crosstown Courier deals combat damage to a player, that player puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Cyclonic Rift
cards.text:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")
cards.flavor: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.

rulings.text: Because a spell with overload doesn't target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can't choose to pay its overload cost instead.
If you don't pay the overload cost of Cyclonic Rift, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won't have any targets.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you're paying (such as an overload cost), add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

foreignNames.name: Rift des Sturmtiefs
foreignNames.text:
Bringe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist und die du nicht kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
Überlast {6}{U} (Du kannst diesen Zauber für seine Überlast-Kosten wirken. Falls du dies tust, verändere seinen Text, indem du im Text alle Vorkommen von „deiner Wahl" durch „jeder" ersetzt.)
foreignNames.flavor: Die Izzet sind auf unnatürliche Katastrophen spezialisiert.

foreignNames.name: Grieta ciclónica
foreignNames.text:
Regresa el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra que no controles a la mano de su propietario.
Sobrecarga {6}{U}. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo por su coste de sobrecarga. Si lo haces, cambia su texto reemplazando "el permanente objetivo" por "cada permanente".)
foreignNames.flavor: Los ízzet se especializan en desastres no naturales.

foreignNames.name: Faille cyclonique
foreignNames.text:
Renvoyez un permanent non-terrain ciblé que vous ne contrôlez pas dans la main de son propriétaire.
Surcharge {6}{U} (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort pour son coût de surcharge. Si vous faites ainsi, modifiez son texte en remplaçant toutes les occurrences de « ciblé(e) » par « chaque ».)
foreignNames.flavor: Les Izzet sont spécialisés dans les catastrophes artificielles.

foreignNames.name: Squarcio Ciclonico
foreignNames.text:
Fai tornare un permanente non terra bersaglio che non controlli in mano al suo proprietario.
Sovraccarico {6}{U} (Puoi lanciare questa magia per il suo costo di sovraccarico. Se lo fai, cambiane il testo sostituendo "un permanente non terra bersaglio" con "ogni permanente non terra".)
foreignNames.flavor: Gli Izzet sono specializzati in catastrofi innaturali.

foreignNames.name: サイクロンの裂け目
foreignNames.text:
あなたがコントロールしていない土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
超過 {6}{U} （あなたはこの呪文をその超過コストで唱えてもよい。そうした場合、あなたがコントロールしていない土地でない各パーマネントをそれぞれオーナーの手札に戻す。）
foreignNames.flavor: イゼット団は不自然災害を専門としている。

foreignNames.name: 회오리 균열
foreignNames.text:
당신이 조종하지 않는 지속물 중 대지가 아닌 지속물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
과부하 {6}{U} (당신은 과부하 비용을 지불하여 이 주문을 발동할 수 있다. 그럴 경우, 이 주문은 "당신이 조종하지 않는 지속물 중 대지가 아닌 각 지속물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다"로 내용이 변한다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 이젯 길드의 특기는 부자연스러운 재해다.

foreignNames.name: Fenda Ciclônica
foreignNames.text:
Devolva a permanente alvo que não seja um terreno e que você não controle para a mão de seu dono.
Sobrecarga {6}{U} (Você pode conjurar esta mágica pagando seu custo de sobrecarga. Se fizer isso, altere seu texto substituindo todas as ocorrências de "a permanente alvo" por "cada permanente".)
foreignNames.flavor: A especialidade dos Izzet são os desastres não naturais.

foreignNames.name: Циклонический Разлом
foreignNames.text:
Верните целевой не являющийся землей перманент, который не находится под вашим контролем, в руку его владельца.
Перегрузка {6}{U}(Вы можете разыграть это заклинание за его стоимость Перегрузки. Если вы это делаете, измените в его тексте все слова «целевой» на «каждый».)
foreignNames.flavor: Иззеты являются мастерами неприродных катастроф.

foreignNames.name: 龙卷裂空
foreignNames.text:
将目标不由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。
超载{6}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）
foreignNames.flavor: 伊捷以非天然灾害为业。

foreignNames.name: 龍卷裂空
foreignNames.text:
將目標不由你操控的非地永久物移回其擁有者手上。
超載{6}{U}（你可以支付此咒語的超載費用來施放它。如果你如此作，將其中的「目標」字樣全部更改為「每個」。）
foreignNames.flavor: 伊捷以非天然災害為業。

cards.originalText:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

cards.name: Dispel
cards.text: Counter target instant spell.
cards.flavor:
"Civilization will subsume us unless we overwhelm it instead."
—Speaker Zegana

foreignNames.name: Bannzauber
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere einen Spontanzauber deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Zivilisation wird uns eingliedern, falls wir sie nicht überwältigen." —Sprecherin Zegana

foreignNames.name: Esfumar
foreignNames.text: Contrarresta el hechizo instantáneo objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "La civilización nos subsumirá a menos que nosotros la aplastemos primero." —Portavoz Zegana

foreignNames.name: Dispersement
foreignNames.text: Contrecarrez le sort d'éphémère ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor: « Si nous ne la submergeons pas les premiers, la civilisation nous absorbera. » —Oratrice Zegana

foreignNames.name: Sfatare
foreignNames.text: Neutralizza una magia istantaneo bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "La civiltà ci ingloberà a meno che non siamo noi a sopraffarla." —Oratrice Zegana

foreignNames.name: 払拭
foreignNames.text: インスタント呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。
foreignNames.flavor: 「もし我々が文明を圧倒しなければ、文明が我々を取り込んでしまうだろう。」 ――話し手ゼガーナ

foreignNames.name: 주문해제
foreignNames.text: 순간마법 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "우리가 문명을 압도해버리지 않으면 문명이 우리를 집어삼킬 것이오." —연설자 제가나

foreignNames.name: Delir
foreignNames.text: Anule a mágica instantânea alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Se não oprimirmos a civilização, ela irá nos assimilar." — Oradora Zegana

foreignNames.name: Рассеять
foreignNames.text: Отмените целевое мгновенное заклинание.
foreignNames.flavor: «Цивилизация подчинит нас, если мы первыми не сокрушим ее». — спикер Зегана

foreignNames.name: 云散
foreignNames.text: 反击目标瞬间咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 「如果我们不征服文明，必将被它纳入。」 ～演说家洁加娜

foreignNames.name: 雲散
foreignNames.text: 反擊目標瞬間咒語。
foreignNames.flavor: 「如果我們不征服文明，必將被它納入。」 ～演說家潔加娜

cards.originalText: Counter target instant spell.

cards.name: Doorkeeper
cards.text:
Defender
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control with defender.
cards.flavor: One piercing stare usually convinces thieves to go elsewhere.

rulings.text: The number of creatures with defender you control is counted when the ability resolves.

foreignNames.name: Türwächter
foreignNames.text:
Verteidiger
{2}{U}, {T}: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl legt die obersten X Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof, wobei X gleich der Anzahl der Kreaturen mit Verteidiger ist, die du kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: Meist reicht ein scharfer Blick, um Diebe davon zu überzeugen, sich ein anderes Opfer zu suchen.

foreignNames.name: Portero
foreignNames.text:
Defensor.
{2}{U}, {T}: El jugador objetivo pone las primeras X cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio, donde X es el número de criaturas con la habilidad de defensor que controlas.
foreignNames.flavor: Una mirada penetrante suele bastar para convencer a los ladrones de que se vayan a otro sitio.

foreignNames.name: Portier
foreignNames.text:
Défenseur
{2}{U}, {T} : Le joueur ciblé met les X cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière, X étant le nombre de créatures avec le défenseur que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor: Un regard transperçant suffit généralement à convaincre les voleurs d'aller voir ailleurs.

foreignNames.name: Guardaporte
foreignNames.text:
Difensore
{2}{U}, {T}: Un giocatore bersaglio mette nel suo cimitero le prime X carte del suo grimorio, dove X è il numero di creature con difensore che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor: Un'occhiata penetrante di solito basta per convincere i ladri ad andarsene altrove.

foreignNames.name: 門衛
foreignNames.text:
防衛
{2}{U}, {T}：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーの一番上からＸ枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。Ｘはあなたがコントロールする防衛を持つクリーチャーの総数に等しい。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ホムンクルス
foreignNames.flavor: 鋭く一瞥するだけで、盗っ人はたいていよそへ行ってしまう。

foreignNames.name: 문지기
foreignNames.text:
수비태세
{2}{U}, {T}: 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 X장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다. X는 당신이 조종하는 생물 중 수비태세 능력을 가진 생물의 수다.
foreignNames.flavor: 문지기의 꿰뚫는 듯한 시선은 대부분의 도둑들로 하여금 발걸음을 돌리게 한다.

foreignNames.name: Porteiro
foreignNames.text:
Defensor
{2}{U}, {T}: O jogador alvo coloca os X cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério, sendo X igual ao número de criaturas com defensor que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor: Um olhar penetrante geralmente convence os ladrões a ir para outro lugar.

foreignNames.name: Дверник
foreignNames.text:
Защитник
{2}{U}, {T}: целевой игрок кладет X верхних карт своей библиотеки на свое кладбище, где X — количество существ со способностью Защитника под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor: Один пронзительный взгляд обычно убеждает грабителей поискать добычу полегче.

foreignNames.name: 守门妖
foreignNames.text:
守军
{2}{U}，{T}：目标牌手将其牌库顶的X张牌置入其坟墓场，X为由你操控、且具守军异能的生物数量。
foreignNames.flavor: 狠狠一瞪通常就足以让盗贼知难而退。

foreignNames.name: 守門妖
foreignNames.text:
守軍
{2}{U}，{T}：目標玩家將其牌庫頂的X張牌置入其墳墓場，X為由你操控、且具守軍異能的生物數量。
foreignNames.flavor: 狠狠一瞪通常就足以讓盜賊知難而退。

cards.originalText:
Defender
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.

cards.name: Downsize
cards.text:
Target creature you don't control gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

rulings.text: Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.
If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.

foreignNames.name: Zusammenschrumpfen
foreignNames.text:
Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du nicht kontrollierst, erhält -4/-0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
Überlast {2}{U} (Du kannst diesen Zauber zu seinen Überlast-Kosten wirken. Falls du dies tust, verändere seinen Text, indem du im Text alle Vorkommen von „deiner Wahl" durch „jeder" ersetzt.)

foreignNames.name: Mermar
foreignNames.text:
La criatura objetivo que no controlas obtiene -4/-0 hasta el final del turno.
Sobrecarga {2}{U}. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo por su coste de sobrecarga. Si lo haces, cambia su texto reemplazando "la criatura objetivo" por "cada criatura".)

foreignNames.name: Rapetissement
foreignNames.text:
Une créature ciblée que vous ne contrôlez pas gagne -4/-0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
Surcharge {2}{U} (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort pour son coût de surcharge. Si vous faites ainsi, modifiez son texte en remplaçant toutes les occurrences de « ciblé(e) » par « chaque ».)

foreignNames.name: Restringere
foreignNames.text:
Una creatura bersaglio che non controlli prende -4/-0 fino alla fine del turno.
Sovraccarico {2}{U} (Puoi lanciare questa magia per il suo costo di sovraccarico. Se lo fai, cambiane il testo sostituendo "una creatura bersaglio" con "ogni creatura".)

foreignNames.name: 圧縮
foreignNames.text:
あなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで－４/－０の修整を受ける。
超過 {2}{U} （あなたはこの呪文をその超過コストで唱えてもよい。そうした場合、あなたがコントロールしていない各クリーチャーはそれぞれターン終了時まで－４/－０の修整を受ける。）

foreignNames.name: 감축
foreignNames.text:
당신이 조종하지 않는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -4/-0을 받는다.
과부하 {2}{U} (당신은 과부하 비용을 지불하여 이 주문을 발동할 수 있다. 그럴 경우, 이 주문은 "당신이 조종하지 않는 각 생물은 턴종료까지 -4/-0을 받는다"로 내용이 변한다.)

foreignNames.name: Diminuição
foreignNames.text:
A criatura alvo que você não controla recebe -4/-0 até o final do turno.
Sobrecarga {2}{U} (Você pode conjurar esta mágica pagando seu custo de sobrecarga. Se fizer isso, altere seu texto substituindo todas as ocorrências de "a criatura alvo" por "cada criatura".)

foreignNames.name: Ужимание
foreignNames.text:
Целевое существо не под вашим контролем получает -4/-0 до конца хода.
Перегрузка {2}{U} (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание за его стоимость Перегрузки. Если вы это делаете, измените в его тексте все слова «целевой» на «каждый».)

foreignNames.name: 压缩尺寸
foreignNames.text:
目标不由你操控的生物得-4/-0直到回合结束。
超载{2}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）

foreignNames.name: 壓縮尺寸
foreignNames.text:
目標不由你操控的生物得-4/-0直到回合結束。
超載{2}{U}（你可以支付此咒語的超載費用來施放它。如果你如此作，將其中的「目標」字樣全部更改為「每個」。）

cards.originalText:
Target creature you don't control gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

cards.name: Faerie Impostor
cards.text:
Flying
When Faerie Impostor enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return another creature you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Many Tin Street shops display a sign on the door: "No cloaks allowed."

rulings.text: Returning another creature you control to its owner’s hand is optional. You may choose to sacrifice Faerie Impostor, even if you could return a creature.

foreignNames.name: Feen-Hochstaplerin
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn die Feen-Hochstaplerin ins Spiel kommt, opfere sie, falls du nicht eine andere Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurückbringst.
foreignNames.flavor: Viele Geschäfte in der Zinnstraße haben ein Schild an der Tür, das besagt: „Kein Zutritt für Kapuzenmantelträger!"

foreignNames.name: Hada impostora
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Hada impostora entre al campo de batalla, sacrifícala a menos que regreses otra criatura que controles a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Muchas tiendas de la Calle Hojalata muestran un cartel en la puerta: "Prohibidas las capas con capucha".

foreignNames.name: Imposteur faerie
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand l'Imposteur faerie arrive sur le champ de bataille, sacrifiez-le à moins de renvoyer une autre créature que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: De nombreuses boutiques de la rue d'étain affichent le panneau suivant : « Port du capuchon interdit. »

foreignNames.name: Spiritella Ingannatrice
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando la Spiritella Ingannatrice entra nel campo di battaglia, sacrificala a meno che tu non faccia tornare un'altra creatura che controlli in mano al suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Molti negozi della Via Latta hanno un cartello sulla porta: "Vietato l'ingresso ai mantelli con cappuccio".

foreignNames.name: フェアリーの騙し屋
foreignNames.text:
飛行
フェアリーの騙し屋が戦場に出たとき、あなたがコントロールする他のクリーチャー１体をオーナーの手札に戻さないかぎり、これを生け贄に捧げる。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — フェアリー・ならず者
foreignNames.flavor: ブリキ通りの店では次の貼り出しがよく見られる――「フード付きのマント着用者は入店禁止。」

foreignNames.name: 흉내꾼 페어리
foreignNames.text:
비행
흉내꾼 페어리가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 조종하는 다른 생물 한 개를 소유자의 손으로 되돌리지 않으면 흉내꾼 페어리를 희생한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 깡통 거리의 수많은 상점의 문에는 "모자달린 망토를 입은 자 출입 금지"라는 문구가 걸려 있다.

foreignNames.name: Fada Impostora
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando Fada Impostora entrar no campo de batalha, sacrifique-a, a menos que você devolva outra criatura que você controla para a mão de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: Muitas lojas na Rua do Estanho têm um aviso na porta: "Proibido capas com capuz."

foreignNames.name: Фея-Самозванка
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Когда Фея-Самозванка выходит на поле битвы, пожертвуйте ее, если только вы не вернете другое существо под вашим контролем в руку его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: На дверях лавок, расположенных на улице Жестянщиков, обычно висит предупреждение: «Вход в капюшонах запрещен!».

foreignNames.name: 冒名仙灵
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当冒名仙灵进战场时，除非你将由你操控的另一个生物移回其拥有者手上，否则牺牲之。
foreignNames.flavor: 许多锡街上的商店会在门口贴出告示：「不许穿着兜帽斗篷入内。」

foreignNames.name: 冒名仙靈
foreignNames.text:
飛行
當冒名仙靈進戰場時，除非你將由你操控的另一個生物移回其擁有者手上，否則犧牲之。
foreignNames.flavor: 許多錫街上的商店會在門口貼出告示：「不許穿著兜帽斗篷入內。」

cards.originalText:
Flying
When Faerie Impostor enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Hover Barrier
cards.text: Defender, flying
cards.flavor: As whispers and rumors increased, so did the demand for fail-safe barriers.

foreignNames.name: Schwebebarriere
foreignNames.text: Verteidiger, Fliegend
foreignNames.flavor: Je mehr die Leute flüsterten und munkelten, desto lauter wurden die Rufe nach sicheren Absperrungen.

foreignNames.name: Barrera aérea
foreignNames.text: Defensor, vuela.
foreignNames.flavor: Conforme aumentaban el murmullo y los rumores, lo hizo también la demanda de barreras fiables.

foreignNames.name: Barrière lévitante
foreignNames.text: Défenseur, vol
foreignNames.flavor: La recrudescence de rumeurs s'accompagna d'une demande accrue en barrières inviolables.

foreignNames.name: Barriera Sospesa
foreignNames.text: Difensore, volare
foreignNames.flavor: Le voci si facevano più insistenti e le richieste di barriere a prova di breccia si facevano più frequenti.

foreignNames.name: 浮遊障壁
foreignNames.text: 防衛、飛行
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — イリュージョン・壁
foreignNames.flavor: 耳打ちや噂話が増えるとともに、安全確実な障壁への需要も増えた。

foreignNames.name: 공중에 떠있는 방어막
foreignNames.text: 수비태세, 비행
foreignNames.flavor: 흉흉한 소문이 퍼질수록 안전한 방어막을 찾는 사람의 수도 늘었다.

foreignNames.name: Barreira Flutuante
foreignNames.text: Defensor, voar
foreignNames.flavor: Conforme os rumores e boatos aumentavam, aumentava também a demanda por barreiras infalíveis.

foreignNames.name: Барьер Зависания
foreignNames.text: Защитник, Полет
foreignNames.flavor: Молва и слухи разрастались, поэтому надежный барьер был нужен как никогда.

foreignNames.name: 气旋障壁
foreignNames.text: 守军，飞行
foreignNames.flavor: 随着耳语和传言甚嚣尘上，越来越多人寻求百分百可靠的屏障。

foreignNames.name: 氣旋障壁
foreignNames.text: 守軍，飛行
foreignNames.flavor: 隨著耳語和傳言甚囂塵上，越來越多人尋求百分百可靠的屏障。

cards.originalText: Defender, flying

cards.name: Inaction Injunction
cards.text:
Detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"To prevent action is to prevent transgression."
—Azorius Arrester motto

rulings.text: Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” No one can activate any activated abilities, including mana abilities, of a detained permanent.
If a creature is already attacking or blocking when it’s detained, it won’t be removed from combat. It will continue to attack or block.
If a noncreature permanent is detained and later turns into a creature, it won’t be able to attack or block.
If a permanent’s activated ability is on the stack when that permanent is detained, the ability will be unaffected.
The static abilities of a detained permanent still apply. The triggered abilities of a detained permanent can still trigger.

When a player leaves a multiplayer game, any continuous effects with durations that last until that player’s next turn or until a specific point in that turn will last until that turn would have begun. They neither expire immediately nor last indefinitely.

foreignNames.name: Untätigkeitsverfügung
foreignNames.text:
Inhaftiere eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. (Bis zu deinem nächsten Zug kann diese Kreatur nicht angreifen oder blocken, und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden.)
Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: „Handlungen verhindern heißt Übertritte verhindern." —Motto der Azorius-Eintreiber

foreignNames.name: Mandato de inacción
foreignNames.text:
Detén la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente. (Hasta tu próximo turno, esa criatura no puede atacar ni bloquear y sus habilidades activadas no pueden activarse.)
Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Impedir la acción es impedir la transgresión." —Lema de los encarceladores azorios

foreignNames.name: Injonction d'inaction
foreignNames.text:
Détenez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle. (Jusqu'à votre prochain tour, cette créature ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées.)
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Empêcher l'action, c'est empêcher la transgression. » —Devise des courtiers d'Azorius

foreignNames.name: Ingiunzione di Cessata Attività
foreignNames.text:
Trattieni una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario. (Fino al tuo prossimo turno, quella creatura non può attaccare o bloccare e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate.)
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Prevenire l'azione è prevenire la trasgressione." —Motto della polizia Azorius

foreignNames.name: 謹慎命令
foreignNames.text:
対戦相手１人がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを留置する。（あなたの次のターンまで、そのクリーチャーでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。）
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「行動を防げば罪も防げる。」 ――アゾリウスの拘引者のモットー

foreignNames.name: 활동 금지령
foreignNames.text:
상대가 조종하는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 억류한다. (당신의 다음 턴이 될 때까지 그 생물은 공격하거나 방어할 수 없으며, 그 생물의 활성화능력은 활성화될 수 없다.)
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "행동을 막는 것은 범죄를 막는 것이다." —아조리우스 체포원의 좌우명

foreignNames.name: Mandado de Inação
foreignNames.text:
Detenha a criatura alvo que um oponente controla. (Até seu próximo turno, aquela criatura não pode atacar nem bloquear e as habilidades ativadas dela não podem ser ativadas.)
Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Prevenir a ação é prevenir a transgressão." — Lema dos Encarceiradores Azorius

foreignNames.name: Приказ о Бездействии
foreignNames.text:
Задержите целевое существо под контролем оппонента. (До вашего следующего хода то существо не может атаковать или блокировать, и его активируемые способности не могут быть активированы.)
Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: «Упредишь действие — предотвратишь преступление». — девиз Задержателя Азориусов

foreignNames.name: 强制静息
foreignNames.text:
拘留目标由对手操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「防止行动就可以防止罪行。」 ～俄佐立逮捕人座右铭

foreignNames.name: 強制靜息
foreignNames.text:
拘留目標由對手操控的生物。（直到你的下一個回合，該生物不能進行攻擊或阻擋，其起動式異能也不能起動。）
抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「防止行動就可以防止罪行。」 ～俄佐立逮捕人座右銘

cards.text: Target player draws two cards.
cards.flavor:
"Day 31: I finally succeeded in my time reversal experiment!
"Day 30: I might have a problem here."
—Journal of the Prime Izmagnus

foreignNames.name: Inspiration
foreignNames.text: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zieht zwei Karten.
foreignNames.flavor: „Tag 31: Endlich ist mir bei meinem Experiment der Zeitumkehr der Durchbruch gelungen!" „Tag 30: Es gibt da möglicherweise ein Problem." —Tagebuch des Höchsten Izmagnus

foreignNames.name: Inspiración
foreignNames.text: El jugador objetivo roba dos cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Día 31: ¡Por fin ha resultado mi experimento de inversión del tiempo! "Día 30: Creo que tengo un problema." —Diario del Izmagnus Primo

foreignNames.name: Inspiration
foreignNames.text: Le joueur ciblé pioche deux cartes.
foreignNames.flavor: « 31e jour : J'ai enfin réussi à inverser le cours du temps ! » « 30e jour : J'ai comme qui dirait un problème. » —Journal du Premier Izmagnus

foreignNames.name: Ispirazione
foreignNames.text: Un giocatore bersaglio pesca due carte.
foreignNames.flavor: "Giorno 31: Finalmente il mio esperimento di inversione temporale ha avuto successo!" "Giorno 30: Forse c'è un problema." —Diario dell'Izmagnus Primario

foreignNames.name: 霊感
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを２枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「31日目：ついに時間の逆行実験に成功した！」 「30日目：これはちとマズイかもしれん。」 ――首席イズマグナスの日誌

foreignNames.name: 영감
foreignNames.text: 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 카드 두 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "제 31일: 드디어 시간 반전 실험에 성공했다!" "제 30일: 문제가 생긴 것 같다." —이젯 길드 수석마도사의 일지

foreignNames.name: Inspiração
foreignNames.text: O jogador alvo compra dois cards.
foreignNames.flavor: "31º dia: Finalmente tive sucesso em meu experimento de reversão temporal! "30º dia: Acho que tenho um problema..." — Diário do Primeiro-Izmagnus

foreignNames.name: Вдохновение
foreignNames.text: Целевой игрок берет две карты.
foreignNames.flavor: «День 31: я наконец-то преуспел в опытах с поворотом времени вспять! День 30: кажется, у меня возникла проблема». — дневник Главного Измагнуса

foreignNames.name: 突发奇想
foreignNames.text: 目标牌手抓两张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「第31日：我的逆转时间实验终于成功了！ 「第30日：这下麻烦了。」 ～伊捷首法师的日记

foreignNames.name: 突發奇想

foreignNames.flavor: 「第31日：我的逆轉時間實驗終於成功了！ 「第30日：這下麻煩了。」 ～伊捷首法師的日記

cards.originalText:
Flying
When Isperia's Skywatch enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

cards.name: Jace, Architect of Thought
cards.text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
[−2]: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library in any order.
[−8]: For each player, search that player's library for a nonland card and exile it, then that player shuffles. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.

rulings.text: For each library, the search is complete only when you explicitly say it is. For example, you can look through one player's library, set that library down, look at another player's library, choose a nonland card in the first library, then choose a nonland card in the second library. Don't reveal any cards from those libraries to any other player until you exile them.
If a card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as its value.
If you can't cast a card, perhaps because there are no legal targets available, or if you choose not to cast one, it will remain exiled. Jace's ability won't allow you to cast it later.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can't pay alternative costs such as overload costs. You can pay additional costs such as kicker costs. If the card has mandatory additional costs, you must pay those.
Jace's first ability creates a delayed triggered ability that triggers whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks. It doesn't matter which player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.
Piles can be empty. If one of the piles is empty, you choose to put all the revealed cards in your hand or on the bottom of your library.
When casting a card this way, ignore timing restrictions based on the card's type. Other timing restrictions, such as “Cast [this card] only during combat,” must be followed.
When resolving Jace's third ability, you search each player's library (including yours) and exile the nonland cards before casting any of them.
You cast the cards by putting them on the stack one at a time, choosing modes, targets, and so on. The last card you cast will be the first one to resolve.

You pick one of your opponents when Jace's second ability resolves. The ability doesn't target that opponent. All players may see the revealed cards and offer opinions. You (not your opponent) choose which pile is put into your hand and which pile is put on the bottom of your library.

foreignNames.name: Jace der Gedankenarchitekt
foreignNames.text:
+1: Immer wenn bis zu deinem nächsten Zug eine Kreatur angreift, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, erhält sie -1/-0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
-2: Decke die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek auf. Ein Gegner teilt diese Karten auf zwei Haufen auf. Nimm die Karten des einen Haufens auf deine Hand und lege die anderen in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.
-8: Durchsuche für jeden Spieler dessen Bibliothek nach einer Karte, die kein Land ist, und schicke sie ins Exil; dieser Spieler mischt dann seine Bibliothek. Du kannst diese Karten wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.

foreignNames.name: Jace, arquitecto del pensamiento
foreignNames.text:
+1: Hasta tu próximo turno, siempre que una criatura que controle un oponente ataque, obtiene -1/-0 hasta el final del turno.
-2: Muestra las primeras tres cartas de tu biblioteca. Un oponente separa esas cartas en dos montones. Pon uno de los montones en tu mano y el otro en el fondo de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.
-8: Por cada jugador, busca en la biblioteca de ese jugador una carta que no sea tierra y exíliala, luego ese jugador baraja su biblioteca. Puedes lanzar esas cartas sin pagar sus costes de maná.

foreignNames.name: Jace, architecte des pensées
foreignNames.text:
+1 : Jusqu'à votre prochain tour, à chaque fois qu'une créature qu'un adversaire contrôle attaque, elle gagne -1/-0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
-2 : Révélez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Un adversaire sépare ces cartes en deux tas. Mettez l'un d'eux dans votre main et l'autre au-dessous de votre bibliothèque, dans l'ordre de votre choix.
-8 : Pour chaque joueur, cherchez dans la bibliothèque de ce joueur une carte non-terrain et exilez-la, puis ce joueur mélange sa bibliothèque. Vous pouvez lancer ces cartes sans payer leur coût de mana.

foreignNames.name: Jace, Architetto del Pensiero
foreignNames.text:
+1: Fino al tuo prossimo turno, ogniqualvolta una creatura controllata da un avversario attacca, prende -1/-0 fino alla fine del turno.
-2: Rivela le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Un avversario separa quelle carte in due pile. Aggiungi una pila alla tua mano e metti l'altra in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.
-8: Per ogni giocatore, passa in rassegna il suo grimorio per una carta non terra ed esiliala, poi quel giocatore rimescola il suo grimorio. Puoi lanciare le carte esiliate in questo modo senza pagare il loro costo di mana.

foreignNames.name: 思考を築く者、ジェイス
foreignNames.text:
＋１：あなたの次のターンまで、対戦相手１人がコントロールするクリーチャー１体が攻撃するたび、それはターン終了時まで－１/－０の修整を受ける。

cards.name: Mizzium Skin
cards.text:
Target creature you control gets +0/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn.
Overload {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

rulings.text: Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.
If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.

rulings.text: If you cast Psychic Spiral when there are no cards in your graveyard, you’ll still shuffle your library.

cards.name: Search the City
cards.text:
When Search the City enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of your library.
Whenever you play a card with the same name as one of the exiled cards, you may put one of those cards with that name into its owner's hand. Then if there are no cards exiled with Search the City, sacrifice it. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

rulings.text: If you don’t sacrifice Search the City, perhaps because it was destroyed in response to its ability triggering, you won’t take an extra turn.
To “play a card” is to play that card as a land or cast that card as a spell, whichever is appropriate.
You can put only one card into its owner’s hand for each card you play.

foreignNames.name: Die Stadt durchsuchen
foreignNames.text:
Wenn Die Stadt durchsuchen ins Spiel kommt, schicke die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek ins Exil.
Immer wenn du eine Karte mit dem gleichen Namen wie eine der ins Exil geschickten Karten spielst, kannst du eine der ins Exil geschickten Karten mit diesem Namen auf die Hand ihres Besitzers bringen. Falls dann keine Karten mehr im Exil sind, die mit Die Stadt durchsuchen ins Exil geschickt wurden, opfere sie. Falls du das tust, erhältst du nach diesem Zug einen weiteren Zug.

foreignNames.text:
Cuando Registrar la ciudad entre al campo de batalla, exilia las primeras cinco cartas de tu biblioteca.
Siempre que juegues una carta con el mismo nombre que una de las cartas exiliadas, puedes poner una de esas cartas con ese nombre en la mano de su propietario. Luego, si no hay cartas exiliadas con Registrar la ciudad, sacrifícala. Si lo haces, toma un turno adicional después de éste.

foreignNames.name: Fouille de la cité
foreignNames.text:
Quand la Fouille de la cité arrive sur le champ de bataille, exilez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque.
À chaque fois que vous jouez une carte ayant le même nom que l'une des cartes exilées, vous pouvez mettre une de ces cartes ayant ce nom dans la main de son propriétaire. Puis, s'il n'y a aucune carte exilée par la Fouille de la cité, sacrifiez-la. Si vous faites ainsi, jouez un tour supplémentaire après celui-ci.

foreignNames.name: Perlustrare la Città
foreignNames.text:
Quando Perlustrare la Città entra nel campo di battaglia, esilia le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio.
Ogniqualvolta giochi una carta con lo stesso nome di una delle carte esiliate, puoi aggiungere una di quelle carte con quel nome alla mano del suo proprietario. Poi se non ci sono carte esiliate con Perlustrare la Città, sacrificalo. Se lo fai, gioca un altro turno dopo questo.

foreignNames.name: 市内捜査
foreignNames.text:
市内捜査が戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上から５枚のカードを追放する。
あなたが、追放したカードと同じ名前のカードを１枚プレイするたび、あなたはこれにより追放されているその名前のカードを１枚オーナーの手札に加えてもよい。その後、市内捜査によって追放されているカードがない場合、これを生け贄に捧げる。そうした場合、このターンの後に追加のターンを得る。

foreignNames.name: 도시 수색
foreignNames.text:
도시 수색이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 다섯 장을 추방한다.
당신이 그렇게 추방된 카드 중 하나와 이름이 같은 카드를 플레이할 때마다, 당신은 그 이름을 가진 카드 중 한 장을 소유자의 손에 넣을 수 있다. 그러고 나서 도시 수색이 추방한 카드가 남아 있지 않으면, 도시 수색을 희생한다. 그렇게 한다면, 이번 턴 후에 추가로 턴을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Vasculhar a Cidade
foreignNames.text:
Quando Vasculhar a Cidade entrar no campo de batalha, exile os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório.
Toda vez que você joga um card com o mesmo nome de um dos cards exilados, você pode colocar um desses cards com esse nome na mão de seu dono. Depois, se não houver mais cards exilados com Vasculhar a Cidade, sacrifique-o. Se fizer isso, jogue um turno extra após este.

foreignNames.name: Поиски в Городе
foreignNames.text:
Когда Поиски в Городе выходят на поле битвы, изгоните пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки.
Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете карту с тем же именем, что у одной из изгнанных карт, вы можете положить одну из тех карт с тем именем в руку ее владельца. Затем, если после этого не осталось карт, изгнанных с помощью Поисков в Городе, пожертвуйте Поиски в Городе. Если вы это делаете, сделайте дополнительный ход вслед за этим.

foreignNames.name: 遍寻全城
foreignNames.text:
当遍寻全城进战场时，放逐你牌库顶的五张牌。
每当你使用一张与以此法放逐的牌同名之牌时，你可以将其中一张具有该名称的牌置入其拥有者手上。然后如果已经没有牌被遍寻全城放逐，则牺牲之。若你如此作，于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

foreignNames.name: 遍尋全城
foreignNames.text:
當遍尋全城進戰場時，放逐你牌庫頂的五張牌。
每當你使用一張與以此法放逐的牌同名之牌時，你可以將其中一張具有該名稱的牌置入其擁有者手上。然後如果已經沒有牌被遍尋全城放逐，則犧牲之。若你如此作，於本回合後進行額外的一個回合。

cards.originalText:
When Search the City enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of your library.
Whenever you play a card with the same name as one of the exiled cards, you may put one of those cards with that name into its owner's hand. Then if there are no cards exiled with Search the City, sacrifice it. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

cards.name: Skyline Predator
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
cards.flavor:
"It will dodge your first arrow and flatten you before there's a second."
—Alcarus, Selesnya archer

foreignNames.name: Himmelsraubtier
foreignNames.text:
Aufblitzen (Du kannst diesen Zauberspruch zu jedem Zeitpunkt wirken, zu dem du einen Spontanzauber wirken könntest.)
Fliegend
foreignNames.flavor: „Er wird deinem ersten Pfeil ausweichen und dich platt machen, bevor ein zweiter kommt." —Alcarus, Selesnija-Bogenschütze

foreignNames.name: Depredador del horizonte
foreignNames.text:
Destello. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo en cualquier momento en que pudieras lanzar un instantáneo.)
Vuela.
foreignNames.flavor: "Esquivará tu primera flecha y te aplastará antes de que haya una segunda." —Alcarus, arquero selesnya

foreignNames.name: Prédateur des tours
foreignNames.text:
Flash (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort à tout moment où vous pourriez lancer un éphémère.)
Vol
foreignNames.flavor: « Il esquivera ta première flèche et t'aplatira avant ta deuxième. » —Alcarus, archer de Selesnya

foreignNames.name: Predatore dell'Orizzonte
foreignNames.text:
Lampo (Puoi lanciare questa magia in ogni momento in cui potresti lanciare un istantaneo.)
Volare
foreignNames.flavor: "Schiverà la tua prima freccia e ti abbatterà prima ancora che arrivi la seconda." —Alcarus, arciere di Selesnya

foreignNames.name: 摩天楼の捕食者
foreignNames.text:
瞬速（あなたはこの呪文を、あなたがインスタントを唱えられるときならいつでも唱えてよい。）
飛行
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ドレイク
foreignNames.flavor: 「あいつは一の矢をかわして、あんたが二の矢を放つ前にあんたを潰すだろうね。」 ――セレズニアの射手、アルカウス

foreignNames.name: 마천루 포식자
foreignNames.text:
섬광 (순간마법을 발동할 수 있는 시기라면 당신은 이 주문을 언제든지 발동할 수 있다.)
비행
foreignNames.flavor: "그것은 첫 번째 화살을 피한 후, 네가 두 번째 화살을 쏘기 전에 널 뭉개버릴 것이다." —셀레스냐 궁수 알카루스

foreignNames.name: Predador do Horizonte
foreignNames.text:
Lampejo (Você poderá conjurar esta mágica a qualquer momento em que puder conjurar uma mágica instantânea.)
Voar
foreignNames.flavor: "Ele vai se esquivar da sua primeira flecha e esmagar você antes que a segunda saia do seu arco." — Alcarus, arqueiro Selesnya

foreignNames.name: Небесный Хищник
foreignNames.text:
Миг (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание при любой возможности разыгрывать мгновенные заклинания.)
Полет
foreignNames.flavor: «Он уклонится от первой стрелы и сомнет вас до того, как вы успеете выпустить вторую». — Алкарус, селезнийский лучник

foreignNames.name: 天际掠夺者
foreignNames.text:
闪现（你可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下施放此咒语。）
飞行
foreignNames.flavor: 「它将闪过你射的第一箭，然后在你射第二箭之前将你压扁。」 ～瑟雷尼亚弓箭手艾凯勒

foreignNames.name: 天際掠奪者
foreignNames.text:
閃現（你可以於你能夠施放瞬間的時機下施放此咒語。）
飛行
foreignNames.flavor: 「牠將閃過你射的第一箭，然後在你射第二箭之前將你壓扁。」 ～瑟雷尼亞弓箭手艾凱勒

cards.originalText:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying

cards.name: Soulsworn Spirit
cards.text:
Soulsworn Spirit can't be blocked.
When Soulsworn Spirit enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

rulings.text: Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” No one can activate any activated abilities, including mana abilities, of a detained permanent.
If a creature is already attacking or blocking when it’s detained, it won’t be removed from combat. It will continue to attack or block.
If a noncreature permanent is detained and later turns into a creature, it won’t be able to attack or block.
If a permanent’s activated ability is on the stack when that permanent is detained, the ability will be unaffected.
The static abilities of a detained permanent still apply. The triggered abilities of a detained permanent can still trigger.

When a player leaves a multiplayer game, any continuous effects with durations that last until that player’s next turn or until a specific point in that turn will last until that turn would have begun. They neither expire immediately nor last indefinitely.

foreignNames.name: Geist der Seelen
foreignNames.text:
Der Geist der Seelen ist unblockbar.
Wenn der Geist der Seelen ins Spiel kommt, inhaftiere eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. (Bis zu deinem nächsten Zug kann diese Kreatur nicht angreifen oder blocken, und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden.)

foreignNames.name: Espíritu comprometido
foreignNames.text:
El Espíritu comprometido es imbloqueable.
Cuando el Espíritu comprometido entre al campo de batalla, detén la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente. (Hasta tu próximo turno, esa criatura no puede atacar ni bloquear y sus habilidades activadas no pueden activarse.)

foreignNames.name: Esprit d'âme assermentée
foreignNames.text:
L'Esprit d'âme assermentée est imblocable.
Quand l'Esprit d'âme assermentée arrive sur le champ de bataille, détenez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle. (Jusqu'à votre prochain tour, cette créature ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées.)

foreignNames.name: Spirito Cuorfedele
foreignNames.text:
Lo Spirito Cuorfedele è imbloccabile.
Quando lo Spirito Cuorfedele entra nel campo di battaglia, trattieni una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario. (Fino al tuo prossimo turno, quella creatura non può attaccare o bloccare e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate.)

foreignNames.name: 魂誓いの霊
foreignNames.text:
魂誓いの霊はブロックされない。
魂誓いの霊が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手１人がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを留置する。（あなたの次のターンまで、そのクリーチャーでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignNames.name: 영혼을 선서한 신령
foreignNames.text:
영혼을 선서한 신령은 방어될 수 없다.
영혼을 선서한 신령이 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 억류한다. (당신의 다음 턴이 될 때까지 그 생물은 공격하거나 방어할 수 없으며, 그 생물의 활성화능력은 활성화될 수 없다.)

foreignNames.name: Espírito Alma-jurada
foreignNames.text:
Espírito Alma-jurada não pode ser bloqueado.
Quando Espírito Alma-jurada entrar no campo de batalha, detenha uma criatura alvo que um oponente controla. (Até o seu próximo turno, aquela criatura não pode atacar nem bloquear e as habilidades ativadas dela não podem ser ativadas.)

foreignNames.name: Присягнувший Дух
foreignNames.text:
Присягнувший Дух не может быть заблокирован.
Когда Присягнувший Дух выходит на поле битвы, задержите целевое существо под контролем оппонента. (До вашего следующего хода то существо не может атаковать или блокировать, и его активируемые способности не могут быть активированы.)

foreignNames.name: 魂誓精怪
foreignNames.text:
魂誓精怪不能被阻挡。
当魂誓精怪进战场时，拘留目标由对手操控的生物。（直到你的下个回合，该生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）

foreignNames.name: 魂誓精靈
foreignNames.text:
魂誓精靈不能被阻擋。
當魂誓精靈進戰場時，拘留目標由對手操控的生物。（直到你的下個回合，該生物不能進行攻擊或阻擋，其起動式異能也不能起動。）

cards.originalText:
Soulsworn Spirit is unblockable.
When Soulsworn Spirit enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

cards.name: Sphinx of the Chimes
cards.text:
Flying
Discard two nonland cards with the same name: Draw four cards.
cards.flavor: "I've dreamt of the future, Isperia. Danger is on the horizon. You must heed my warning."

foreignNames.name: Sphinx der Glocken
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wirf zwei Karten mit gleichem Namen ab, die kein Land sind: Ziehe vier Karten.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich habe von der Zukunft geträumt, Isperia. Am Horizont lauert Gefahr. Du musst dir meine Warnung zu Herzen nehmen."

foreignNames.name: Esfinge de las campanas
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Descartar dos cartas que no sean tierra con el mismo nombre: Roba cuatro cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: "He soñado con el futuro, Isperia. Hay peligro en el horizonte. Debes escuchar mi advertencia."

foreignNames.name: Sphinx des carillons
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Défaussez-vous de deux cartes non-terrain ayant le même nom : Piochez quatre cartes.
foreignNames.flavor: « J'ai rêvé de l'avenir, Isperia. Le danger est à l'horizon. Tu dois écouter ma mise en garde. »

foreignNames.name: Sfinge delle Campane
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Scarta due carte non terra con lo stesso nome: Pesca quattro carte.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ho visto il futuro, Isperia. Il pericolo si staglia all'orizzonte. Ricorda il mio avvertimento."

foreignNames.name: 鐘楽のスフィンクス
foreignNames.text:
飛行
同じ名前を持つ土地でないカードを２枚捨てる：カードを４枚引く。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — スフィンクス
foreignNames.flavor: 「イスペリアよ、私は未来を夢見た。危険が迫っている。私の警告を聞くのだ。」

foreignNames.name: 관종의 스핑크스
foreignNames.text:
비행
이름이 같고 대지가 아닌 카드 두 장을 버린다: 카드 네 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "이스페리아, 미래에 대한 꿈을 꿨소. 곧 위험이 닥칠 것이오. 내 경고를 반드시 명심하시오."

foreignNames.name: Esfinge do Carrilhão
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Descarte dois cards com o mesmo nome que não sejam terrenos: Compre quatro cards.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sonhei com o futuro, Isperia. O perigo raia no horizonte. Você precisa dar ouvidos ao meu aviso."

foreignNames.name: Сфинкс Колокольного Звона
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Сбросьте две не являющиеся землями карты с одинаковым именем: возьмите четыре карты.
foreignNames.flavor: «Исперия, я видел будущее. Опасность на горизонте. Услышь мое предупреждение!»

foreignNames.name: 鸣钟史芬斯
foreignNames.text:
飞行
弃两张同名的非地牌：抓四张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「伊佩利，我梦见了未来。危险近在眼前。你务必听从我的警告。」

foreignNames.name: 鳴鐘史芬斯
foreignNames.text:
飛行
棄兩張同名的非地牌：抽四張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「伊佩利，我夢見了未來。危險近在眼前。你務必聽從我的警告。」

cards.originalText:
Flying
Discard two nonland cards with the same name: Draw four cards.

cards.name: Stealer of Secrets
cards.text: Whenever Stealer of Secrets deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
cards.flavor: The Dimir would hire her, if only they knew where she lived. The Azorius would condemn her, if only they knew her name.

foreignNames.name: Geheimnisdiebin
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn die Geheimnisdiebin einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Wüssten die Dimir, wo sie lebt, würden sie sie anheuern. Wüssten die Azorius ihren Namen, würden sie sie verurteilen.

foreignNames.name: Ladrón de secretos
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Ladrón de secretos haga daño de combate a un jugador, roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Los dimir la contratarían si pudieran averiguar dónde vive. Los azorios la condenarían si pudieran averiguar su nombre.

foreignNames.name: Voleuse de secrets
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que la Voleuse de secrets inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: S'ils savaient où la trouver, les Dimir l'engageraient volontiers. S'ils savaient son nom, les Azorius la condamneraient volontiers.

foreignNames.name: Ladra di Segreti
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta la Ladra di Segreti infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: I Dimir la ingaggerebbero, se solo sapessero dove vive. Gli Azorius la condannerebbero, se solo sapessero il suo nome.

foreignNames.name: 秘密を盗む者
foreignNames.text: 秘密を盗む者がプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ならず者
foreignNames.flavor: 住処さえ分かれば、ディミーアは彼女を雇うだろう。名前さえ分かれば、アゾリウスは彼女を糾弾するだろう。

foreignNames.name: 비밀을 훔치는 자
foreignNames.text: 비밀을 훔치는 자가 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그녀가 어디에 사는지만 알았어도 디미르 길드는 그녀를 고용했을 것이며, 그녀의 이름만 알았어도 아조리우스 길드는 그녀에게 형을 선고했을 것이다.

foreignNames.name: Ladrão de Segredos
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que Ladrão de Segredos causar dano de combate a um jogador, compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: Os Dimir a contratariam... se soubessem onde ela mora. Os Azorius a condenariam... se soubessem o nome dela.

foreignNames.name: Похитительница Тайн
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда Похитительница Тайн наносит боевые повреждения игроку, возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Димиры наняли бы ее, если бы знали, где она обитает. Азориусы бы ее осудили, если бы знали ее имя.

foreignNames.name: 刺探客
foreignNames.text: 每当刺探客对一位牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 底密尔想雇用她，但她来去无踪。俄佐立想判决她，但她往来无名。

foreignNames.name: 刺探客
foreignNames.text: 每當刺探客對一位玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 底密爾想僱用她，但她來去無蹤。俄佐立想判決她，但她往來無名。

cards.originalText: Whenever Stealer of Secrets deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

cards.name: Syncopate
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
cards.flavor: "Patience, mage. Killing you now would be too easy."

foreignNames.name: Unterbinden
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, falls sein Beherrscher nicht {X} bezahlt. Wird der Zauberspruch auf diese Weise neutralisiert, schicke ihn ins Exil, anstatt ihn auf den Friedhof seines Besitzers zu legen.
foreignNames.flavor: „Nur Geduld, Magier. Dich jetzt zu töten wäre zu leicht."

foreignNames.name: Sincopar
foreignNames.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo a menos que su controlador pague {X}. Si ese hechizo es contrarrestado de esta manera, exílialo en vez de ponerlo en el cementerio de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: "Paciencia, mago. Matarte ahora sería demasiado fácil."

foreignNames.name: Syncope
foreignNames.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé à moins que son contrôleur ne paie {X}. Si ce sort est contrecarré de cette manière, exilez-le à la place de le mettre dans le cimetière de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: « Patience, mage. Te tuer tout de suite serait trop facile. »

foreignNames.name: Sincopare
foreignNames.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio a meno che il suo controllore non paghi {X}. Se quella magia è neutralizzata in questo modo, esiliala invece di metterla nel cimitero del suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: "Pazienta, mago. Ucciderti ora sarebbe troppo facile."

foreignNames.name: 中略
foreignNames.text: 呪文１つを対象とする。それのコントローラーが{X}を支払わないかぎり、それを打ち消す。その呪文がこれにより打ち消された場合、それをオーナーの墓地に置く代わりに追放する。

foreignNames.name: 중략
foreignNames.text: 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문의 조종자가 {X}를 지불하지 않으면 그 주문을 무효화한다. 이렇게 그 주문이 무효화되면 그 카드를 소유자의 무덤에 넣는 대신 추방한다.

cards.name: Assassin's Strike
cards.text: Destroy target creature. Its controller discards a card.
cards.flavor: When Selesnya missionaries moved into the Shanav Quarter, they faced scorn, ridicule, and ultimately martyrdom.

rulings.text: If the creature is an illegal target when Assassin’s Strike tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. Its controller won’t discard a card.
You must be able to target a creature to cast Assassin’s Strike.
If Assassin’s Strike resolves but the creature isn’t destroyed (perhaps because it regenerated or has indestructible), its controller will discard a card.

cards.name: Dead Reveler
cards.text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: He's the unlife of the party.

rulings.text: A creature with unleash can’t block if it has any +1/+1 counter on it, not just one put on it by the unleash ability.
Putting a +1/+1 counter on a creature with unleash that’s already blocking won’t remove it from combat. It will continue to block.
The unleash ability applies no matter where the creature is entering the battlefield from.

You make the choice to have the creature with unleash enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter or not as it’s entering the battlefield. At that point, it’s too late for a player to respond to the creature spell by trying to counter it, for example.

cards.name: Grave Betrayal
cards.text: Whenever a creature you don't control dies, return it to the battlefield under your control with an additional +1/+1 counter on it at the beginning of the next end step. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

rulings.text: Each creature you don’t control that dies causes a delayed triggered ability to trigger at the beginning of the next end step. If there are multiple such abilities, you can put them on the stack in any order. The creatures will return to the battlefield one at a time as each ability resolves. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.
Grave Betrayal doesn’t overwrite any previous colors or types. Rather, it adds another color and another creature type.
If a creature you don’t control dies during the end step, that creature won’t return to the battlefield until the beginning of the next end step.

If the creature card leaves the graveyard before the delayed triggered ability resolves, it won’t return to the battlefield. This is also true if the card leaves the graveyard and returns to the graveyard before that ability resolves.
If the creature is normally colorless, it will simply be black. It won’t be both black and colorless.

In a multiplayer game, if more than one player controls a Grave Betrayal and a creature controlled by none of those players dies, each Grave Betrayal will create a delayed triggered ability at the beginning of the next end step. The first such ability to resolve will return the creature. Usually, this will be one controlled by the player furthest from the active player in turn order.

The phrase “with an additional +1/+1 counter on it” means that the creature enters the battlefield with one more +1/+1 counter than it would normally enter the battlefield with. It doesn’t keep any counters it had on it when it died.

cards.name: Grim Roustabout
cards.text:
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Grim Roustabout.
cards.flavor: He'll point you to your death row seats.

rulings.text: A creature with unleash can’t block if it has any +1/+1 counter on it, not just one put on it by the unleash ability.
Putting a +1/+1 counter on a creature with unleash that’s already blocking won’t remove it from combat. It will continue to block.
The unleash ability applies no matter where the creature is entering the battlefield from.

You make the choice to have the creature with unleash enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter or not as it’s entering the battlefield. At that point, it’s too late for a player to respond to the creature spell by trying to counter it, for example.

cards.name: Launch Party
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
cards.flavor: Life's too short to not do the things you love.

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target when Launch Party tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. No player will lose 2 life.

If you sacrifice an attacking or blocking creature during the declare blockers step, it won’t deal combat damage. If you wait until the combat damage step, but that creature is dealt lethal damage, it’ll be destroyed before you get a chance to sacrifice it.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
